AppliedForce.name: Applied Force
AppliedForce.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but Telekinesis pushes 20% further.

PowerConduit.name: Power Conduit
PowerConduit.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Lightning Surge by 10.

DoubleCross.name: Double Cross
DoubleCross.description: Increases the range of Discord Strike by 25% and also hits in a line perpendicular to the forward strike.

RecklessStrike.name: Reckless Strike
RecklessStrike.description: Reduces the delay of Discord Strike by 0.25 seconds but if it hits an enemy you become Vulnerable, causing Alarak to take 25% more damage for 2 seconds.

CycleofDiscord.name: Cycle of Discord
CycleofDiscord.description: Reduces the cooldown of Discord Strike by 2 seconds. If a Discord Strike hits no enemies, the mana cost is refunded and cooldown reduced by 3 seconds.

ChaosReigns.name: Chaos Reigns
ChaosReigns.description: Quest: Each time Discord Strike hits a Hero its damage increases by 3 up to 45. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 45

EndlessEnergy.name: Endless Energy
EndlessEnergy.description: Quest: Heroes hit between you and the victim permanently decreases the cooldown of Lightning Surge by 0.2 seconds, up to 2 seconds.

Thunderstruck.name: Thunderstruck
Thunderstruck.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10%, but Lightning Surge slows enemies hit between you and the victim by 70% for 2 seconds.

DeadlyCharge.name: Deadly Charge
DeadlyCharge.description: Cooldown: 0.5 secondsAfter channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in the path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.This ability will take over your Trait button.

CounterStrike.name: Counter-Strike
CounterStrike.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsChannel for 1 second and become Protected. After, if an enemy Hero attacked you, send a shockwave that deals 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage.This ability will take over your Trait button.

Dissonance.name: Dissonance
Dissonance.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases Discord Strike's silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

Psychokinesis.name: Psychokinesis
Psychokinesis.description: Increases the damage of Telekinesis by 100%.

HinderedMotion.name: Hindered Motion
HinderedMotion.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but Telekinesis slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.

PureMalice.name: Pure Malice
PureMalice.description: When a nearby Ally Hero dies, your Sadism bonus is increased by 8%, stacking up to 40%. This bonus Sadism cannot be consumed by Hasty Bargain and is lost on death.

QuickMind.name: Quick Mind
QuickMind.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% and the cooldown of Telekinesis by 6 seconds.

ProjectedForce.name: Projected Force
ProjectedForce.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases the range of Telekinesis by 25%.

SustainingPower.name: Sustaining Power
SustainingPower.description: Increases the healing you receive from dealing damage to Heroes with Lightning Surge by 30%.

NegativelyCharged.name: Negatively Charged
NegativelyCharged.description: Increases damage dealt to enemies hit by the center beam of Lightning Surge by 100%, but does not generate any additional healing.

LastLaugh.name: Last Laugh
LastLaugh.description: Cooldown: 20 secondsActivate to remove all roots, slows, and damage over time effects and teleport to the chosen location. Activating Last Laugh will immediately reduce Alarak's Health to 1.

HastyBargain.name: Hasty Bargain
HastyBargain.description: Cooldown: 20 secondsActivate to permanently reduce your Sadism bonus by 4% and reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

CompoundingAether.name: Compounding Aether
CompoundingAether.description: Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast increase its damage by 100.

DeepBreathing.name: Deep Breathing
DeepBreathing.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50.Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase your sight radius by 100%.

TimewalkersPursuit.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
TimewalkersPursuit.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.52.Reward: After gathering 15 Globes you also gain 5% Ability Power.

PeerIntoTheFuture.name: Peer Into The Future
PeerIntoTheFuture.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

PiercingSands.name: Piercing Sands
PiercingSands.description: Sand Blast will now hit the first two Heroes in its path.

BronzeTalons.name: Bronze Talons
BronzeTalons.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of your next Basic Attack by 250%.

MobiusLoop.name: Mobius Loop
MobiusLoop.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

DragonsEye.name: Dragon's Eye
DragonsEye.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

ChronoSickness.name: Chrono Sickness
ChronoSickness.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Stasis ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

SlowingSands.name: Slowing Sands
SlowingSands.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

TemporalLoop.name: Temporal Loop
TemporalLoop.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

ByeBye.name: Bye Bye!
ByeBye.description: Reduces the cast time of your Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

ReachingthroughTime.name: Reaching through Time
ReachingthroughTime.description: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon’s Breath's range by 15%.

TimeOut.name: Time Out
TimeOut.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

ShiftingSands.name: Shifting Sands
ShiftingSands.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases your Ability Power by 10% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 50%, and the duration is refreshed whenever you damage enemy Heroes with Sand Blast.

FastForward.name: Fast Forward
FastForward.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 1 second.

QuantumOverdrive.name: Quantum Overdrive
QuantumOverdrive.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

PocketofTime.name: Pocket of Time
PocketofTime.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 50% to 80%.

Loophole.name: Loophole
Loophole.description: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near your initial target.

PastandFutureMe.name: Past and Future Me
PastandFutureMe.description: After casting Sand Blast, leave an echo of yourself behind. The next time you cast Sand Blast, the echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that does 40% damage.

AndorhalAnomaly.name: Andorhal Anomaly
AndorhalAnomaly.description: You gain 3 charges of Time Trap, and can have 3 active at once. When your cooldown finishes, you gain 3 charges at once.

GatheringStorm.name: Gathering Storm
GatheringStorm.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.

SeasonedMarksman.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage.Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

Bribe.name: Bribe
Bribe.description: Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster. Current number of Bribe stacks: 1.

StaticShield.name: Static Shield
StaticShield.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of your maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

Updraft.name: Updraft
Updraft.description: Increase Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%.

HammerGains.name: Hammer Gains
HammerGains.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

SecretWeapon.name: Secret Weapon
SecretWeapon.description: Increases Hammerang' range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

BOOMerang.name: BOOMerang
BOOMerang.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 384 (182 + 4% per level) damage around the Hammer.

ChargedUp.name: Charged Up
ChargedUp.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 15%.

HinterlandBlast.name: Hinterland Blast
HinterlandBlast.description: After a short delay, deal 901 (428 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within a long line.

MightyGust.name: Mighty Gust
MightyGust.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Thunderstrikes.name: Thunderstrikes
Thunderstrikes.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

FlowRider.name: Flow Rider
FlowRider.description: While Tailwind is active, your Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

GiantKiller.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

CripplingHammer.name: Crippling Hammer
CripplingHammer.description: Increases the Hammerang's slow from 25% to 50%.

AerieGusts.name: Aerie Gusts
AerieGusts.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 2 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 20% to 30%.

Afterburner.name: Afterburner
Afterburner.description: Barrel Roll increases your Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

CalloftheWildhammer.name: Call of the Wildhammer
CalloftheWildhammer.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

WindTunnel.name: Wind Tunnel
WindTunnel.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

NexusFrenzy.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

EpicMount.name: Epic Mount
EpicMount.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 25 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

SpurredOnward.name: Spurred Onward
SpurredOnward.description: Increase the Initial speed boost of Hurry Up, Oaf! to 70%. Hurry Up, Oaf! cooldown reduced by 2 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero with an Ability.

Shove.name: Shove
Shove.description: Nudge Cho a small distance in the direction you choose.

EyeofKilrogg.name: Eye of Kilrogg
EyeofKilrogg.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.

BombsAway.name: Bomb's Away
BombsAway.description: Increases Cho's Rune Bomb range by 20%.

RunicPersistence.name: Runic Persistence
RunicPersistence.description: Using Runic Blast no longer destroys Rune Bomb.

DoubleBack.name: Double Back
DoubleBack.description: Dread Orb's third bounce instead bounces backwards.

EdgeofMadness.name: Edge of Madness
EdgeofMadness.description: Increases Shadowflame damage by 20% against nearby targets, and 10% to mid-range targets. Distant targets take normal damage.

DoubleTrouble.name: Double Trouble
DoubleTrouble.description: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero afflicted with Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

DarkDescent.name: Dark Descent
DarkDescent.description: Increases Runic Blast's damage by 5% everytime you get a Hero takedown, up to 20%. These bonuses are lost upon dying.

ShadowBoltVolley.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
ShadowBoltVolley.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 103 damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

TwistingNether.name: Twisting Nether
TwistingNether.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 40% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 342 damage.

RisingDread.name: Rising Dread
RisingDread.description: Dread Orb does 25% more damage on the second bounce and 75% more damage the third bounce.

SpeedofTwilight.name: Speed of Twilight
SpeedofTwilight.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain 30% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

DreadShield.name: Dread Shield
DreadShield.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield absorbing 561 damage for 5 seconds.

TwilightNova.name: Twilight Nova
TwilightNova.description: After the first bounce, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

GiantScorcher.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher.description: Shadowflame also does 3% of a Hero's maximum Health.

Shadowflare.name: Shadowflare
Shadowflare.description: Increases Shadowflare's width by 50%. Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

Shadowfury.name: Shadowfury
Shadowfury.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

TheNetherCalls.name: The Nether Calls
TheNetherCalls.description: Increases Twisting Nether's slow by 10% and damage by 10% for every second channeled, to a maximum of 40% increase.

PsychoticBreak.name: Psychotic Break
PsychoticBreak.description: Increases your Ability Damage by 5%. Upon dying, the cooldown on your Heroic Ability is reset and you can continue to use Abilities for 10 seconds.

Wolfheart.name: Wolfheart
Wolfheart.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 1 second.

PerfectAim.name: Perfect Aim
PerfectAim.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 2.550000/Actor,GreymaneGilneanCocktailGuide,Height*100% and refunds 60 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

ScentedTincture.name: Scented Tincture
ScentedTincture.description: Gilnean Cocktail reveals enemy Heroes for 10 seconds.

Viciousness.name: Viciousness
Viciousness.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

ThickSkin.name: Thick Skin
ThickSkin.description: Using Darkflight reduces the damage of the next 2 Heroic Basic Attacks made against you by 50% while a Worgen.

Insatiable.name: Insatiable
Insatiable.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana, up to 140.

DraughtOverflow.name: Draught Overflow
DraughtOverflow.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

QuicksilverBullets.name: Quicksilver Bullets
QuicksilverBullets.description: Increases Human Basic Attack range by 20%.

IncendiaryElixir.name: Incendiary Elixir
IncendiaryElixir.description: Quest: Every time you hit an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail increase its explosion damage by 10, up to 150. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

WizenedDuelist.name: Wizened Duelist
WizenedDuelist.description: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, to a maximum of 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

GofortheThroat.name: Go for the Throat
GofortheThroat.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for 921 (437 + 4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

MarkedfortheKill.name: Marked for the Kill
MarkedfortheKill.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero in its path for 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage. Each time you deal damage to the Vulnerable Hero, the duration is refreshed.

RunningWild.name: Running Wild
RunningWild.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

VisceralAttacks.name: Visceral Attacks
VisceralAttacks.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

OntheProwl.name: On the Prowl
OntheProwl.description: Inner Beast increases your Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

UnfetteredAssault.name: Unfettered Assault
UnfetteredAssault.description: Razor Swipe lunges Greymane 60% farther, but its cooldown is increased by 33.33%.

EagerWolf.name: Eager Wolf
EagerWolf.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

Executioner.name: Executioner
Executioner.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

AlphaKiller.name: Alpha Killer
AlphaKiller.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

Unleashed.name: Unleashed
Unleashed.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 25% more damage, up to 100%.

GilneanRoulette.name: Gilnean Roulette
GilneanRoulette.description: Marked for the Kill is now refreshed by any damage done to the Vulnerable Hero.

HuntersBlunderbuss.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
HuntersBlunderbuss.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 4% damage behind the target.

ToothandClaw.name: Tooth and Claw
ToothandClaw.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 4% damage.

PursuitofFlame.name: Pursuit of Flame
PursuitofFlame.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

GlyphofDrainLife.name: Glyph of Drain Life
GlyphofDrainLife.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

EchoedCorruption.name: Echoed Corruption
EchoedCorruption.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

ChaoticEnergy.name: Chaotic Energy
ChaoticEnergy.description: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes your next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

HealthFunnel.name: Health Funnel
HealthFunnel.description: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is reset.

ConsumeSoul.name: Consume Soul
ConsumeSoul.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsInstantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 800 (380 + 4% per level) Health.

BoundbyShadow.name: Bound by Shadow
BoundbyShadow.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

DevourtheFrail.name: Devour the Frail
DevourtheFrail.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

CurseofExhaustion.name: Curse of Exhaustion
CurseofExhaustion.description: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

HungerforPower.name: Hunger for Power
HungerforPower.description: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

Horrify.name: Horrify
Horrify.description: Cooldown: 80 secondsAfter a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

RainofDestruction.name: Rain of Destruction
RainofDestruction.description: Cooldown: 100 secondsSummon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

FelArmor.name: Fel Armor
FelArmor.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants a Spell Shield, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30.43% for 2.5 seconds.

HarvestLife.name: Harvest Life
HarvestLife.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

DarkBargain.name: Dark Bargain
DarkBargain.description: Your maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but your Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

Healthstone.name: Healthstone
Healthstone.description: Cooldown: 60 secondsActivate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health.

RampantHellfire.name: Rampant Hellfire
RampantHellfire.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 6% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

RuinousAffliction.name: Ruinous Affliction
RuinousAffliction.description: Corruption deals an additional 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 511 (243 + 4% per level) damage.

DarknessWithin.name: Darkness Within
DarknessWithin.description: After using Life Tap, the next ability you cast has 20% increased Ability Power.

Haunt.name: Haunt
Haunt.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second and feared enemies become Vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage.

DeepImpact.name: Deep Impact
DeepImpact.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

DemonicCircle.name: Demonic Circle
DemonicCircle.description: Cooldown: 1 secondsSummon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle.

Immolation.name: Immolation
Immolation.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 29 damage a second for 4 seconds.

BatteredAssault.name: Battered Assault
BatteredAssault.description: If you hit 2 or more Heroes with Sweeping Strike, increase its damage bonus from 35% to 125%.

UnendingHatred.name: Unending Hatred
UnendingHatred.description: Every Minion you kill gives you 0.1 Attack Damage. Every Takedown gives 1 Attack Damage. Once you reach 20 Attack Damage, receive an additional 10 Attack damage.

RapidChase.name: Rapid Chase
RapidChase.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2.19 seconds.

FriendorFoe.name: Friend or Foe
FriendorFoe.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used on allied Heroes without damaging them.

Unbound.name: Unbound
Unbound.description: Allows Sweeping Strike to go over walls and terrain. If Sweeping Strike doesn't hit any Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

ReflexiveBlock.name: Reflexive Block
ReflexiveBlock.description: Dive reduces the damage taken from the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks by 75%. Last 3 seconds.

ThirstingBlade.name: Thirsting Blade
ThirstingBlade.description: Betrayer's Thirt's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

HuntersOnslaught.name: Hunter's Onslaught
HuntersOnslaught.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. Double this bonus versus Heroes.

Metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
Metamorphosis.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 101 damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 439 for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

TheHunt.name: The Hunt
TheHunt.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 550 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

NimbleDefender.name: Nimble Defender
NimbleDefender.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero you gain Resistant for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

ElusiveStrike.name: Elusive Strike
ElusiveStrike.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

SixthSense.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense.description: Evasion reduces the damage you take from the next 2 Abilities by 75% while it's active.

MarkedforDeath.name: Marked for Death
MarkedforDeath.description: Dive deals an extra 493 damage if you hit a target consecutively within 10 seconds.

FieryBrand.name: Fiery Brand
FieryBrand.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

BladesofAzzinoth.name: Blades of Azzinoth
BladesofAzzinoth.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows you to activate Blades of Azzinoth to increase your Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

DemonicForm.name: Demonic Form
DemonicForm.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases your Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of disabling effects against you by 50%. You can now mount in Demonic Form.

NowheretoHide.name: Nowhere to Hide
NowheretoHide.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. You passively reveal enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

NexusBlades.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

BoltoftheStorm.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

WintersReach.name: Winter's Reach
WintersReach.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

LingeringChill.name: Lingering Chill
LingeringChill.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

DeepChill.name: Deep Chill
DeepChill.description: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

ConjurersPursuit.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
ConjurersPursuit.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.54 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

FrostShards.name: Frost Shards
FrostShards.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

ArcaneIntellect.name: Arcane Intellect
ArcaneIntellect.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and abilities return 25.

FrostArmor.name: Frost Armor
FrostArmor.description: Enemy Heroes that attack you are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds you reduce damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 50%.

IceFloes.name: Ice Floes
IceFloes.description: Doubles the width of Cone of Cold and causes each target hit to reduce its cooldown by 1 seconds, to a maximum of 5 seconds per cast.

Frostbitten.name: Frostbitten
Frostbitten.description: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

IceLance.name: Ice Lance
IceLance.description: When Frostbolt hits a Chilled target its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and you regain 10 Mana.

RingofFrost.name: Ring of Frost
RingofFrost.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

SummonWaterElemental.name: Summon Water Elemental
SummonWaterElemental.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

StormFront.name: Storm Front
StormFront.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

IceBarrier.name: Ice Barrier
IceBarrier.description: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 4 seconds.

IcyVeins.name: Icy Veins
IcyVeins.description: Activate to make your Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

Snowstorm.name: Snowstorm
Snowstorm.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

NorthernExposure.name: Northern Exposure
NorthernExposure.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold are also afflicted with Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25% for 2 seconds.

NumbingBlast.name: Numbing Blast
NumbingBlast.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

ColdSnap.name: Cold Snap
ColdSnap.description: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

Wintermute.name: Wintermute
Wintermute.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

ImprovedIceBlock.name: Improved Ice Block
ImprovedIceBlock.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

ArcanePower.name: Arcane Power
ArcanePower.description: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 5 seconds.

Convection.name: Convection
Convection.description: When Flamestrike damages an enemy Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 100. Lose all damage bonuses if you die. When you gain 100 damage bonus, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose the bonus if you die.

FelInfusion.name: Fel Infusion
FelInfusion.description: Increases your Ability Power by 5%. Heal for 206 Health when you activate Verdant Spheres.

ManaAddict.name: Mana Addict
ManaAddict.description: Increases your maximum Mana by 15 when you pick up a Regeneration Globe. Once you've gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, you can also activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of your maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

NetherWind.name: Nether Wind
NetherWind.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

EnergyRoil.name: Energy Roil
EnergyRoil.description: When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

ManaTap.name: Mana Tap
ManaTap.description: Activating Verdante Spheres restores 3.9% of your maximum Mana.

BurnedFlesh.name: Burned Flesh
BurnedFlesh.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage to 8% of their maximum Health.

GravityCrush.name: Gravity Crush
GravityCrush.description: Gravity Lapse causes enemies to take 25% additional damage from Kael'thas for 4 seconds.

SunfireEnchantment.name: Sunfire Enchantment
SunfireEnchantment.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes your next Basic Attack to instead shoot a spell dealing 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage.

Phoenix.name: Phoenix
Phoenix.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 171 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 171 damage and splashing for 50%.

Pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 2150 damage to an enemy Hero and 1075 damage to enemies nearby.

Pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns are refreshed by 1 second.

Backdraft.name: Backdraft
Backdraft.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemies Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

FissionBomb.name: Fission Bomb
FissionBomb.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius and damage by 20%.

FuryoftheSunwell.name: Fury of the Sunwell
FuryoftheSunwell.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

SunKingsFury.name: Sun King's Fury
SunKingsFury.description: Your Basic Attacks do 417 bonus damage to enemies affected by Living Bomb.

TwinSpheres.name: Twin Spheres
TwinSpheres.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

Rebirth.name: Rebirth
Rebirth.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. You may order the Phoenix to move to a different location once while the Phoenix is alive.

PresenceOfMind.name: Presence Of Mind
PresenceOfMind.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50% and reduces its cooldown by 25 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

MasterofFlames.name: Master of Flames
MasterofFlames.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

SiphoningImpact.name: Siphoning Impact
SiphoningImpact.description: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10.15% of her maximum Health.

EnergizingGrasp.name: Energizing Grasp
EnergizingGrasp.description: Primal Grasp refunds 10 Mana for each enemy hit, up to 60.

Block.name: Block
Block.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

CleanKill.name: Clean Kill
CleanKill.description: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of your next Ravage by 25%.

PsionicPulse.name: Psionic Pulse
PsionicPulse.description: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 88 (42 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

FuryoftheSwarm.name: Fury of the Swarm
FuryoftheSwarm.description: Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around Kerrigan.

Envenom.name: Envenom
Envenom.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 damage over 10 seconds.

Adaptation.name: Adaptation
Adaptation.description: After 5 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

AssimilationMastery.name: Assimilation Mastery
AssimilationMastery.description: Increases the duration of Assimilation by 100%. While Assimilation Shields are active your Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

BladedMomentum.name: Bladed Momentum
BladedMomentum.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

Maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom.description: Deals 82 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

SummonUltralisk.name: Summon Ultralisk
SummonUltralisk.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 91 damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

LingeringEssence.name: Lingering Essence
LingeringEssence.description: Increases Assimilation Shield's duration to 20 seconds.

DoubleStrike.name: Double Strike
DoubleStrike.description: When your Basic Abilities damage an enemy, your next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

QueensRush.name: Queen's Rush
QueensRush.description: Activate to increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

AggressiveDefense.name: Aggressive Defense
AggressiveDefense.description: Increases base Shield amount gained from Assimilation by 100%.

EssenceforEssence.name: Essence for Essence
EssenceforEssence.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

Overdrive.name: Overdrive
Overdrive.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

Omegastorm.name: Omegastorm
Omegastorm.description: Maelstrom size increased by 25% . Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

Torrasque.name: Torrasque
Torrasque.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 8 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

ForceArmor.name: Force Armor
ForceArmor.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, you gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing the damage from the next enemy Ability against you by 50%. Can hold up to 4 charges. Can only gain 1 charge per cast.

AstralPresence.name: Astral Presence
AstralPresence.description: Your Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

PowerHungry.name: Power Hungry
PowerHungry.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Ability Power for 20 seconds.

AetherWalker.name: Aether Walker
AetherWalker.description: If you haven't taken damage in the last 5 seconds, Teleport costs no Mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

Dominance.name: Dominance
Dominance.description: Takedowns restore 20% of your maximum Health.

ChargedBlast.name: Charged Blast
ChargedBlast.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 191 (91 + 4% per level) damage.

Triumvirate.name: Triumvirate
Triumvirate.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 65% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

Seeker.name: Seeker
Seeker.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 274 (130 + 4% per level) damage.

ZeisVengeance.name: Zei's Vengeance
ZeisVengeance.description: Arcane Orb does an additional 25% more damage to enemies far away.

Calamity.name: Calamity
Calamity.description: Teleport does 542 (309 + 3% per level) damage to enemies near your destination.

Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 1168 (462 + 5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

WaveofForce.name: Wave of Force
WaveofForce.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 425 (168 + 5% per level) damage.

Cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer.description: When you use an Ability, increase your next Basic Attack by 75% and cause it to deal Ability damage. Stacks up to 3 times.

Illusionist.name: Illusionist
Illusionist.description: Increases Teleport range by 50%, and if you lose more than 20% of your Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed. This cannot happen more than once every 4 seconds.

GlassCannon.name: Glass Cannon
GlassCannon.description: Increases your Ability Power by 15%, but decreases your maximum Health by 15%.

Fireflies.name: Fireflies
Fireflies.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed, and lowers its cooldown by 1 second.

ArcaneOrbit.name: Arcane Orbit
ArcaneOrbit.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

Mirrorball.name: Mirrorball
Mirrorball.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles.

DiamondSkin.name: Diamond Skin
DiamondSkin.description: When you Teleport, gain 20% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 4 seconds.

TalRashasElements.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
TalRashasElements.description: Your Abilities benefit from 10% bonus damage as long as they aren't cast twice in a row.

Repulsion.name: Repulsion
Repulsion.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

ArchonPurePower.name: Archon: Pure Power
ArchonPurePower.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing you to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

Photosynthesis.name: Photosynthesis
Photosynthesis.description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

NaturalPerspective.name: Natural Perspective
NaturalPerspective.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

CruelSpores.name: Cruel Spores
CruelSpores.description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 mana is restored.

NimbleWisp.name: Nimble Wisp
NimbleWisp.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

TimelostWisp.name: Timelost Wisp
TimelostWisp.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

SkyboundWisp.name: Skybound Wisp
SkyboundWisp.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

DividingWisp.name: Dividing Wisp
DividingWisp.description: The first time you relocate a Wisp it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location. Only one Dividing Wisp can be active at a time.

SiphoningToxin.name: Siphoning Toxin
SiphoningToxin.description: As long as you have Nature's Toxin active on an enemy you heal for 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health a second.

WildVigor.name: Wild Vigor
WildVigor.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of your next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

SplinteredSpear.name: Splintered Spear
SplinteredSpear.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes your next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies.

NaturesCulling.name: Nature's Culling
NaturesCulling.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroic enemies.

ThornwoodVine.name: Thornwood Vine
ThornwoodVine.description: Send forth vines that deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

LeapingStrike.name: Leaping Strike
LeapingStrike.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 594 (286 + 4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

UnfairAdvantage.name: Unfair Advantage
UnfairAdvantage.description: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

GreaterSpellShield.name: Greater Spell Shield
GreaterSpellShield.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 75% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

ChokingPollen.name: Choking Pollen
ChokingPollen.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

StarWoodSpear.name: Star Wood Spear
StarWoodSpear.description: Using Crippling Spores increases your Basic Attacks range by 50% for 6 seconds.

InvigoratingSpores.name: Invigorating Spores
InvigoratingSpores.description: Using Crippling Spores increases your Attack Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

ForestsWrath.name: Forest's Wrath
ForestsWrath.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and your vision radius by 35%.

BoundlessStride.name: Boundless Stride
BoundlessStride.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. You can also use Leaping Strike on allies.

GallopingGait.name: Galloping Gait
GallopingGait.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

AbolishMagic.name: Abolish Magic
AbolishMagic.description: Activate to remove all stuns, roots, silences, slows, and damage over time effects from yourself and an ally. For 2 seconds after, the duration of stuns, roots, silences and slows is reduced by 50%.

TacticalEspionage.name: Tactical Espionage
TacticalEspionage.description: While Cloaked, Nova gains 4 Mana per second.

AdvancedCloaking.name: Advanced Cloaking
AdvancedCloaking.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 30% while Cloaked.

Longshot.name: Longshot
Longshot.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases your next Basic Attack range by 30%.

CovertOps.name: Covert Ops
CovertOps.description: Increases Pinning Shot's slow by 2% for every second that Nova is Cloaked, to a maximum of a 50%. Bonus fades when Nova is un-Cloaked for 1 second.

RemoteDelivery.name: Remote Delivery
RemoteDelivery.description: Increases Holo Decoy cast range by 100% and its sight range by 50%.

RapidProjection.name: Rapid Projection
RapidProjection.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

HoloStability.name: Holo Stability
HoloStability.description: Increases the duration of Holo Decoy by 120%.

OneintheChamber.name: One in the Chamber
OneintheChamber.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack deals 80% additional damage.

AntiArmorShells.name: Anti-Armor Shells
AntiArmorShells.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 250% damage, but your Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

SnipeMaster.name: Snipe Master
SnipeMaster.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy Hero.

TripleTap.name: Triple Tap
TripleTap.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 741 (352 + 4% per level) damage each.

PrecisionStrike.name: Precision Strike
PrecisionStrike.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 1000 (475 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

PsionicEfficiency.name: Psionic Efficiency
PsionicEfficiency.description: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 10%.

ExplosiveRound.name: Explosive Round
ExplosiveRound.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

PerfectShot.name: Perfect Shot
PerfectShot.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipereduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.

CripplingShot.name: Crippling Shot
CripplingShot.description: Enemies hit by Pinning Shot become Vulnerable, taking 25% increased damage for the duration of the slow.

DoubleFake.name: Double Fake
DoubleFake.description: Casting Holo Decoy creates an additional Decoy at your current location.

FastReload.name: Fast Reload
FastReload.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

PrecisionBarrage.name: Precision Barrage
PrecisionBarrage.description: Precision Strike holds two charges with a short cooldown.

Rewind.name: Rewind
Rewind.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

GhostProtocol.name: Ghost Protocol
GhostProtocol.description: Activate to gain Stealth. You do not lose Stealth from taking damage, attacking, or using Abilities for 2 seconds.

RaidersRecruitment.name: Raiders' "Recruitment"
RaidersRecruitment.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Recruitment.  Use 15 stacks to "recruit" a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum 50 stacks.Current number of Recruitment stacks: 1

ScoutingDrone.name: Scouting Drone
ScoutingDrone.description: Cooldown: 45 secondsPlaces a Scouting Drone at target location, revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

FocusedAttack.name: Focused Attack
FocusedAttack.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 75% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

VigorousAssault.name: Vigorous Assault
VigorousAssault.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

ConfidentAim.name: Confident Aim
ConfidentAim.description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

HamstringShot.name: Hamstring Shot
HamstringShot.description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

RevolutionOverdrive.name: Revolution Overdrive
RevolutionOverdrive.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

FightorFlight.name: Fight or Flight
FightorFlight.description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates it also grants Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

PuttinOnaClinic.name: Puttin' On a Clinic
PuttinOnaClinic.description: Whenever an enemy Minion, Hero, or captured Mercenary you have recently damaged is destroyed, your Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

Hyperion.name: Hyperion
Hyperion.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

RaynorsRaiders.name: Raynor's Raiders
RaynorsRaiders.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 43.2 damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

DoubleBarreled.name: Double-Barreled
DoubleBarreled.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

SteelResolve.name: Steel Resolve
SteelResolve.description: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

RelentlessLeader.name: Relentless Leader
RelentlessLeader.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Once every 5 seconds, if you are stunned you knock nearby enemies away.

ClusterRound.name: Cluster Round
ClusterRound.description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

Bullseye.name: Bullseye
Bullseye.description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Activate to increase your Attack Speed by 40% and Movement Speed by 10% for 4 seconds.

ScorchedEarth.name: Scorched Earth
ScorchedEarth.description: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 damage in an area.

DuskWings.name: Dusk Wings
DuskWings.description: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

ACardtoPlay.name: A Card to Play
ACardtoPlay.description: Whenever a Hero (ally or enemy) is killed, the cooldown of your Heroic Ability is reduced by 15 seconds.

WayofIllusion.name: Way of Illusion
WayofIllusion.description: Quest: Every time one of your Images Critically Strikes a Hero, gain 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20.Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, gain an additional 20 Attack Damage.

WayoftheBlade.name: Way of the Blade
WayoftheBlade.description: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

WayoftheWind.name: Way of the Wind
WayoftheWind.description: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 24.8%.Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, the duration before Wind Walk can be broken by damage is increased to 2.5 seconds.

Mirage.name: Mirage
Mirage.description: Mirror Image grants you and your Images 2 charges of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy Ability against you by 50%. Can hold up to 2 charges.

OnewiththeWind.name: One with the Wind
OnewiththeWind.description: While Stealthed by Wind Walk, you take 60% reduced damage from all sources.

Deflection.name: Deflection
Deflection.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, you take 25% reduced damage from Hero Basic Attacks.

BurningBlade.name: Burning Blade
BurningBlade.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of your Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

PhantomPain.name: Phantom Pain
PhantomPain.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of your Basic Attack damage for each Image you have active.

CrushingBlows.name: Crushing Blows
CrushingBlows.description: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

Bladestorm.name: Bladestorm
Bladestorm.description: Cooldown: 110 secondsBecome an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

IllusionMaster.name: Illusion Master
IllusionMaster.description: Cooldown: 6 secondsSwitch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 20% of your damage.

MirroredSteel.name: Mirrored Steel
MirroredSteel.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

Kawarimi.name: Kawarimi
Kawarimi.description: Wind Walk creates an Image at your location that will continue whatever you were doing.

Shukuchi.name: Shukuchi
Shukuchi.description: Wind Walk teleports you a short distance in the direction you're currently facing.

MercilessStrikes.name: Merciless Strikes
MercilessStrikes.description: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

HarshWinds.name: Harsh Winds
HarshWinds.description: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from you and your Images for 3 seconds.

PresstheAttack.name: Press the Attack
PresstheAttack.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase your Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

DanceofDeath.name: Dance of Death
DanceofDeath.description: Your Images use Bladestorm when you do.

ThreeBladeStyle.name: Three Blade Style
ThreeBladeStyle.description: Your Images gain an additional 50% of your Health, and last up to 32 seconds.

WindStrider.name: Wind Strider
WindStrider.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

BlademastersPursuit.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
BlademastersPursuit.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

Invigoration.name: Invigoration
Invigoration.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

ChopMeat.name: Chop Meat
ChopMeat.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.

Abattoir.name: Abattoir
Abattoir.description: Decreases the amount of Fresh Meat lost on death from 10 to 5. Once you complete the Fresh Meat quest, Heroes continue to drop Meat that grants Attack Damage. This bonus Meat is not lost on death.

FlailAxe.name: Flail Axe
FlailAxe.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

UnrelentingPursuit.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
UnrelentingPursuit.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 40% upon impact.

CheapShot.name: Cheap Shot
CheapShot.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.

InsatiableBlade.name: Insatiable Blade
InsatiableBlade.description: Increases Butcher's Brand's healing from 75% to 100% of your Basic Attack damage. While facing the branded enemy, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

Victuals.name: Victuals
Victuals.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, you regain 4% of your maximum Health.

MeatShield.name: Meat Shield
MeatShield.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, you take 50% reduced Ability Damage for 2.5 seconds.

FurnaceBlast.name: Furnace Blast
FurnaceBlast.description: Cooldown: 60 secondsAfter a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

LambtotheSlaughter.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
LambtotheSlaughter.description: Cooldown: 80 secondsThrow a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

Cleaver.name: Cleaver
Cleaver.description: Basic Attack deal 35% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

SavageCharge.name: Savage Charge
SavageCharge.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

BrutalStrike.name: Brutal Strike
BrutalStrike.description: After using Hamstring, your next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

CripplingSlam.name: Crippling Slam
CripplingSlam.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 25%.

Enraged.name: Enraged
Enraged.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsReceiving damage that reduces you below 50% of your maximum Health causes you to become Enraged for 10 seconds. While Enraged, you gain 40% Attack Speed and become Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25%.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Attack and Movement Speed by 5% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

FiresofHell.name: Fires of Hell
FiresofHell.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

Slaughterhouse.name: Slaughterhouse
Slaughterhouse.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

RollingThunder.name: Rolling Thunder
RollingThunder.description: Increases Chain Lightning's range by 30% and attacking enemies recently hit by Chain Lightning restores 10 Mana.

RabidWolves.name: Rabid Wolves
RabidWolves.description: Damaging Heroes with Feral Spirit grants 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

RideTheLightning.name: Ride The Lightning
RideTheLightning.description: Chain Lightning can hit 2 additional enemies for 50% damage.

WindShear.name: Wind Shear
WindShear.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

StoneWolves.name: Stone Wolves
StoneWolves.description: Increases the duration of Feral Spirit's root from 1 second to 1.5 seconds.

FollowThrough.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

FrostwolfsGrace.name: Frostwolf's Grace
FrostwolfsGrace.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to immediately heal you.

Sundering.name: Sundering
Sundering.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 274 damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
Earthquake.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

RestlessWolves.name: Restless Wolves
RestlessWolves.description: If Feral Spirit hits an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

GraceOfAir.name: Grace Of Air
GraceOfAir.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

SpellShield.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

ForkedLightning.name: Forked Lightning
ForkedLightning.description: Allows Chain Lightning to hold 2 charges that can be used in quick succession.

TempestFury.name: Tempest Fury
TempestFury.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

RideTheWind.name: Ride The Wind
RideTheWind.description: Increases Windfury's Movement Speed bonus from 30% to 40%. Windfury attacks increase the Movement Speed duration by 1 second.

BloodforBlood.name: Blood for Blood
BloodforBlood.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

EarthenShields.name: Earthen Shields
EarthenShields.description: You and your allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

PulseStrike.name: Pulse Strike
PulseStrike.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

Slipstream.name: Slipstream
Slipstream.description: Reduces Recall's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

TracerRounds.name: Tracer Rounds
TracerRounds.description: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

PartingGift.name: Parting Gift
PartingGift.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 526 (250 + 4% per level) damage each to different targets.

IsThataHealthPack.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
IsThataHealthPack.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

Untouchable.name: Untouchable
Untouchable.description: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

BulletTime.name: Bullet Time
BulletTime.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

SpatialEcho.name: Spatial Echo
SpatialEcho.description: Using Recall grants 2 charges of Blink.

StickyBomb.name: Sticky Bomb
StickyBomb.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.

QuantumSpike.name: Quantum Spike
QuantumSpike.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

PulseRounds.name: Pulse Rounds
PulseRounds.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 150%.

BulletSpray.name: Bullet Spray
BulletSpray.description: Increases Melee's radius by 50%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

Ricochet.name: Ricochet
Ricochet.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

LeechingRounds.name: Leeching Rounds
LeechingRounds.description: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt.

SleightofHand.name: Sleight of Hand
SleightofHand.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

FocusFire.name: Focus Fire
FocusFire.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 191 (91 + 4% per level) bonus damage. This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

LockedandLoaded.name: Locked and Loaded
LockedandLoaded.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase your Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

GetStuffed.name: Get Stuffed!
GetStuffed.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away from you.

TotalRecall.name: Total Recall
TotalRecall.description: Recall also heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

CompositionB.name: Composition B
CompositionB.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

ShrugItOff.name: Shrug It Off
ShrugItOff.description: Run and Gun grants Resistant for 3 seconds, reducing the damage you take by 25%.

PresstheAdvantage.name: Press the Advantage
PresstheAdvantage.description: Run and Gun increases your Basic Attack range by 25% for 4 seconds.

Dash.name: Dash
Dash.description: Run and Gun increases your Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe you gather, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Once you have gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, also increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%.

CombatTactician.name: Combat Tactician
CombatTactician.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.75 seconds.

IntheRhythm.name: In the Rhythm
IntheRhythm.description: While Minigun is active, Basic Attack against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by .03 seconds.

TheBiggerTheyAre.name: The Bigger They Are...
TheBiggerTheyAre.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 40% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 40%.

MasterAssassin.name: Master Assassin
MasterAssassin.description: Hero Takedowns permanently increase your Attack Speed by 1%, stacking up to 15 times. Upon reaching 15 Stacks, your attack speed is increased by an additional 10%.

Quarterback.name: Quarterback
Quarterback.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

ConcussionGrenade.name: Concussion Grenade
ConcussionGrenade.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 2% and the knockback by 100%.

RelentlessSoldier.name: Relentless Soldier
RelentlessSoldier.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 33%.

CommandeerOdin.name: Commandeer Odin
CommandeerOdin.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

DrakkenLaserDrill.name: Drakken Laser Drill
DrakkenLaserDrill.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

ThatstheStuff.name: That's the Stuff!
ThatstheStuff.description: Minigun heals you for 100% of the bonus damage it deals to Heroes.

NeosteelCoating.name: Neosteel Coating
NeosteelCoating.description: Activate to reduce Ability Damage taken by 50% for 3 seconds.

TitanGrenade.name: Titan Grenade
TitanGrenade.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

LeadRain.name: Lead Rain
LeadRain.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

ArmorPiercingRounds.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
ArmorPiercingRounds.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

BigRedButton.name: Big Red Button
BigRedButton.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile.

FocusingDiodes.name: Focusing Diodes
FocusingDiodes.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

SizzlinAttacks.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
SizzlinAttacks.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigum.

BobandWeave.name: Bob and Weave
BobandWeave.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

MonsterHunter.name: Monster Hunter
MonsterHunter.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 30 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 100%.

Caltrops.name: Caltrops
Caltrops.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 99 (47 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 20% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

HotPursuit.name: Hot Pursuit
HotPursuit.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and you gain 4 Mana per second.

PuncturingArrow.name: Puncturing Arrow
PuncturingArrow.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 50 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

Punishment.name: Punishment
Punishment.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 5%.

CreedoftheHunter.name: Creed of the Hunter
CreedoftheHunter.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Your Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

Arsenal.name: Arsenal
Arsenal.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades, which deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 3 seconds.

DeathDealer.name: Death Dealer
DeathDealer.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 5% to 10% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

RepeatingArrow.name: Repeating Arrow
RepeatingArrow.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

Strafe.name: Strafe
Strafe.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

RainofVengeance.name: Rain of Vengeance
RainofVengeance.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

SiphoningArrow.name: Siphoning Arrow
SiphoningArrow.description: You heal for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

TemperedbyDiscipline.name: Tempered by Discipline
TemperedbyDiscipline.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, your Basic Attacks heal you for 25% of the damage dealt.

Gloom.name: Gloom
Gloom.description: Cooldown: 5 secondsReduces all Ability Damage taken by 20%. Activate to consume all Hatred, increasing the Ability Damage reduction by 3% per Hatred consumed. Lasts 5 seconds.

FrostShot.name: Frost Shot
FrostShot.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 2 seconds.

SeethingHatred.name: Seething Hatred
SeethingHatred.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

Manticore.name: Manticore
Manticore.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

Vengeance.name: Vengeance
Vengeance.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 75 (36 + 4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage you deal with Strafe is returned as Health.

StormofVengeance.name: Storm of Vengeance
StormofVengeance.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

Rancor.name: Rancor
Rancor.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

FarflightQuiver.name: Farflight Quiver
FarflightQuiver.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 40%.

GreaterCleave.name: Greater Cleave
GreaterCleave.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

RapidDisplacement.name: Rapid Displacement
RapidDisplacement.description: Reduces the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

RegenerationMaster.name: Regeneration Master
RegenerationMaster.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

MasterWarpBlade.name: Master Warp-Blade
MasterWarpBlade.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same Hero deals 100% bonus damage.

VigorousStrike.name: Vigorous Strike
VigorousStrike.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

GatheringPower.name: Gathering Power
GatheringPower.description: Hero takedowns increase Ability Power by 2%, to a maximum of 30%. This bonus Ability Power is lost on death.

SustainedAnomaly.name: Sustained Anomaly
SustainedAnomaly.description: The Singularity Spike explodes for area damage and slows, regardless if it hits a target or not.

VorpalBlade.name: Vorpal Blade
VorpalBlade.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target you attacked within 3 seconds.

VoidSlash.name: Void Slash
VoidSlash.description: Cleave deals 30% increased damage if used while Cloaked.

ShadowSpike.name: Shadow Spike
ShadowSpike.description: No longer decloak when using Singularity Spike. Range increased by 20%.

FirstAid.name: First Aid
FirstAid.description: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

SearingAttacks.name: Searing Attacks
SearingAttacks.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 15 Mana.

ShadowAssault.name: Shadow Assault
ShadowAssault.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

VoidPrison.name: Void Prison
VoidPrison.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

BurningRage.name: Burning Rage
BurningRage.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

Wormhole.name: Wormhole
Wormhole.description: For 2 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.

AssassinsBlade.name: Assassin's Blade
AssassinsBlade.description: Gain 25% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds when breaking Permanent Cloak. 10% increased Movement Speed while Stealthed from Permanent Cloak.

RendingCleave.name: Rending Cleave
RendingCleave.description: Cleave deals an additional 50% damage over 5 seconds.

DoubleBombs.name: Double Bombs
DoubleBombs.description: After you cast Singularity Spike, you can cast a second one for free within 3 seconds for 50% normal damage.

Stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

NerazimFury.name: Nerazim Fury
NerazimFury.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

ProtectivePrison.name: Protective Prison
ProtectivePrison.description: Allies are also no longer affected by Void Prison.

ExtendedSpikes.name: Extended Spikes
ExtendedSpikes.description: Increases the max range of Impale by 25%.

DampenMagic.name: Dampen Magic
DampenMagic.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 8 seconds.

AssaultScarab.name: Assault Scarab
AssaultScarab.description: Increases the attack damage of spawned Beetles by 30%.

Underking.name: Underking
Underking.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

LocustNeedles.name: Locust Needles
LocustNeedles.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

LegionofBeetles.name: Legion of Beetles
LegionofBeetles.description: Anub'arak automatically spawns Beetles every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

ShedExoskeleton.name: Shed Exoskeleton
ShedExoskeleton.description: Using Harden Carapace also increases Anub'arak's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

ChitinousPlating.name: Chitinous Plating
ChitinousPlating.description: Increases Harden Carapace's Shield amount by 40%.

LeechingScarabs.name: Leeching Scarabs
LeechingScarabs.description: Beetles heal you for 50% of their damage with each attack if you are nearby.

LocustSwarm.name: Locust Swarm
LocustSwarm.description: Deal 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

Cocoon.name: Cocoon
Cocoon.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

UrticatingSpines.name: Urticating Spines
UrticatingSpines.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

BedofBarbs.name: Bed of Barbs
BedofBarbs.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemy Move Speed by 30% and deals 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

Epicenter.name: Epicenter
Epicenter.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 85% and lowers the cooldown by 4 seconds for each Hero hit.

BeetleJuiced.name: Beetle, Juiced
BeetleJuiced.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes sapwns a Beetle.

HiveMaster.name: Hive Master
HiveMaster.description: Anub'arak gains a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 336 (160 + 4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 82 (39 + 4% per level) health.

Cryptweave.name: Cryptweave
Cryptweave.description: Staying near the Coccon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

HardenedShield.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

ReactiveParry.name: Reactive Parry
ReactiveParry.description: Activating Twin Blades reduces the damage received from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Can store up to 2 charges.

AmateurOpponent.name: Amateur Opponent
AmateurOpponent.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage versus non-Heroic enemies.

ShieldBattery.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery.description: Reduces Shield Overload's cooldown by 8 seconds if it lasts for the full duration.

LethalAlacrity.name: Lethal Alacrity
LethalAlacrity.description: Increases Blade Dash range and speed by 30%.

ChronoSurge.name: Chrono Surge
ChronoSurge.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

TemplarsZeal.name: Templar's Zeal
TemplarsZeal.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 100% faster while you are below 50% Health.

WarpSickness.name: Warp Sickness
WarpSickness.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

SolariteReaper.name: Solarite Reaper
SolariteReaper.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

PsionicSynergy.name: Psionic Synergy
PsionicSynergy.description: Every time Blade Dash hits an enemy Hero, it reduces Shield Overload's cooldown by 4 seconds.

SuppressionPulse.name: Suppression Pulse
SuppressionPulse.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 250 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

PurifierBeam.name: Purifier Beam
PurifierBeam.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 404 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

PhaseBulwark.name: Phase Bulwark
PhaseBulwark.description: When Shield Overload activates, you take 50% less damage from Abilities for 4 seconds.

TripleStrike.name: Triple Strike
TripleStrike.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3 but increase its cooldown by 1 second..

GravitonVortex.name: Graviton Vortex
GravitonVortex.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first.

ShieldSurge.name: Shield Surge
ShieldSurge.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 100%, but decays to the normal amount over 3 seconds.

ZealotCharge.name: Zealot Charge
ZealotCharge.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

TitanKiller.name: Titan Killer
TitanKiller.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

PsionicWound.name: Psionic Wound
PsionicWound.description: Twin Blades final strike causes enemy Heroes to become Vulnerable for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

OrbitalBombardment.name: Orbital Bombardment
OrbitalBombardment.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

TargetPurified.name: Target Purified
TargetPurified.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest enemy Hero.

ForceofWill.name: Force of Will
ForceofWill.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

EternalHunger.name: Eternal Hunger
EternalHunger.description: Quest: Using Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero permanently increases the Mana it restores by 4, up to 40. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Frostmourne Hungers, also increase its damage bonus by 25%.

FrostPresence.name: Frost Presence
FrostPresence.description: Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds when it hits an enemy Hero.

FrozenWastes.name: Frozen Wastes
FrozenWastes.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.

Deathlord.name: Deathlord
Deathlord.description: Reduce Death Coil's cooldown by 2 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

RuneTap.name: Rune Tap
RuneTap.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals you for 3.9% of your max Health.

ImmortalCoil.name: Immortal Coil
ImmortalCoil.description: You gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when you use it on enemies. If you damage an enemy Hero with it, you also heal for an additional 100% of the damage dealt.

IceboundFortitude.name: Icebound Fortitude
IceboundFortitude.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 25% and reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs agaisnt you by 75% for 3 seconds.

ArmyoftheDead.name: Army of the Dead
ArmyoftheDead.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 586 Health.

SummonSindragosa.name: Summon Sindragosa
SummonSindragosa.description: Deals 504 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

TrailofFrost.name: Trail of Frost
TrailofFrost.description: Increases Howling Blast's range by 30% and causes it to also root enemies between you and the target for 1.25 seconds.

FrostStrike.name: Frost Strike
FrostStrike.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

FrigidWinds.name: Frigid Winds
FrigidWinds.description: Frozen Tempest reduces enemy Attack Speed by -200% per second, stacking up to 40%.

RemorselessWinter.name: Remorseless Winter
RemorselessWinter.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.75 seconds. This effect only happen once every 10 seconds.

FrostmourneFeeds.name: Frostmourne Feeds
FrostmourneFeeds.description: Increased application to your next 2 Basic Attacks.

EmbraceDeath.name: Embrace Death
EmbraceDeath.description: Death Coil deals 10% more damage for each 10% of life you are missing.

LegionofNorthrend.name: Legion of Northrend
LegionofNorthrend.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

AbsoluteZero.name: Absolute Zero
