AbsoluteZero.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

DeathsAdvance.name: Death's Advance
DeathsAdvance.description: Passively increases your Movement Speed by 10%. Activate to increase this bonus to 30% for 3 seconds.

AntiMagicShield.name: Anti-Magic Shield
AntiMagicShield.description: Activate to reduce damage taken from Abilities by 100% for 3 seconds, and heal yourself for 25% of the damage prevented.

AccumulatingFire.name: Accumulating Fire
AccumulatingFire.description: Quest: Everytime you set a Hero on fire with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After igniting 30 Heroes, you gain Resistant for 1 second per Hero set on fire, reducing damage taken by 25%.

GroundingBrew.name: Grounding Brew
GroundingBrew.description: Fortifying Brew reduces all incoming Ability Damage by 30% while drinking.

FreshestIngredients.name: Freshest Ingredients
FreshestIngredients.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

ElusiveBrawler.name: Elusive Brawler
ElusiveBrawler.description: Cooldown: 20 secondsActivate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Your Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 3 seconds.

DeadlyStrike.name: Deadly Strike
DeadlyStrike.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while you have Shields from Fortifying Brew.

KegToss.name: Keg Toss
KegToss.description: Quest: Everytime Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

RingofFire.name: Ring of Fire
RingofFire.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 114 (55 + 4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

BrewmastersBalance.name: Brewmaster's Balance
BrewmastersBalance.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health per second.

BolderFlavor.name: Bolder Flavor
BolderFlavor.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields you for 697 (331 + 4% per level). Additionally, Shields persists for 1 extra second after you stop drinking.

RefreshingElixir.name: Refreshing Elixir
RefreshingElixir.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%, or by 60% while drinking Fortifying Brew.

WanderingKeg.name: Wandering Keg
WanderingKeg.description: Cooldown: 70 secondsRoll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

StormEarthFire.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
StormEarthFire.description: Cooldown: 100 secondsSplit into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

PressurePoint.name: Pressure Point
PressurePoint.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

ATouchofHoney.name: A Touch of Honey
ATouchofHoney.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

WitheringFlames.name: Withering Flames
WitheringFlames.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Ability Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

AnotherRound.name: Another Round
AnotherRound.description: After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of your next Basic Ability will be reduced by 3 seconds.

EnoughtoShare.name: Enough to Share
EnoughtoShare.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 119 (57 + 4% per level) per second.

UntappedPotential.name: Untapped Potential
UntappedPotential.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 25% and reduces damage taken by 50%.

ElementalConduit.name: Elemental Conduit
ElementalConduit.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of your maximum Health and empowers their abilities. Storm can grant your spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds. Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

PurifyingBrew.name: Purifying Brew
PurifyingBrew.description: Cooldown: 5 secondsThe next Stun or Silence used against you has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

StormstoutSecretRecipe.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
StormstoutSecretRecipe.description: Heal for 1.5% of your maximum Health every time your Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

SurgingDash.name: Surging Dash
SurgingDash.description: Increases Surging Fist range and speed by 25%.

BlazingBulwark.name: Blazing Bulwark
BlazingBulwark.description: Consuming Blaze grants you ??? stack of Block when you hit an enemy Hero, up to 10. Block reduces damage taken from enemy Basic Attacks by 50%.

FuelfortheFlame.name: Fuel for the Flame
FuelfortheFlame.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your next Consuming Blaze heal by 50%.

RunedGauntlet.name: Runed Gauntlet
RunedGauntlet.description: Rune Bomb increases your next Basic Attack by 75%.

Rollback.name: Rollback
Rollback.description: Rune Bomb now returns to you, damaging enemies in its path.

SearedFlesh.name: Seared Flesh
SearedFlesh.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.

PowerSurge.name: Power Surge
PowerSurge.description: Reduces the initial delay of Surging Fist by 50% and it is 100% wider.

FireEater.name: Fire Eater
FireEater.description: Basic Attacks against targets inflicted with Consuming Blaze heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

IAMHurrying.name: I AM Hurrying!
IAMHurrying.description: Increases the duration of Gall's "Hurry Up, Oaf!" by 1.5 second and it no longer fades over time.

HammerofTwilight.name: Hammer of Twilight
HammerofTwilight.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer to deal 377 (164 + 4.5% per level) damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage.

RunicFeedback.name: Runic Feedback
RunicFeedback.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces your Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit.

SurgeofStamina.name: Surge of Stamina
SurgeofStamina.description: After using Surging Fist, the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs applied to you are reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.

MoltenBlock.name: Molten Block
MoltenBlock.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 202 (96 + 4% per level) damage per second.

TwilightVeil.name: Twilight Veil
TwilightVeil.description: Consuming Blaze reduces damage taken from Abilities by 50% for 2 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

FrenziedFists.name: Frenzied Fists
FrenziedFists.description: If Surging Fist hits an enemy Hero, your Attack Speed is increased by 100% for 4 seconds.

CripplingBlow.name: Crippling Blow
CripplingBlow.description: Enemies hit by Surging Fist are slowed by 90% for 1.25 seconds.

CthunsGift.name: C'thun's Gift
CthunsGift.description: Your Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

FavoroftheOldGods.name: Favor of the Old Gods
FavoroftheOldGods.description: Upheaval grants you Resistant, reducing your damage taken by 50% for 5 seconds.

TheWillOfGall.name: The Will Of Gall
TheWillOfGall.description: Gall can activate Will of Gall to make you Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

EnduringSwarm.name: Enduring Swarm
EnduringSwarm.description: Dark Swarm reduces the damage of the next two Abilities made against you by 50%.

PrimalAggression.name: Primal Aggression
PrimalAggression.description: Dark Swarm duration increased by 0.5 seconds and it deals 100% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

EnhancedAgility.name: Enhanced Agility
EnhancedAgility.description: Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Movement Speed by 1.5%, up to 15%.

TissueRegeneration.name: Tissue Regeneration
TissueRegeneration.description: Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Health Regeneration by 5, up to 50.

NumbingEruption.name: Numbing Eruption
NumbingEruption.description: Emerging from Burrow knocks nearby enemies back and slows them by 30% for 2 seconds.

OneWhoCollects.name: One-Who-Collects
OneWhoCollects.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

HeroStalker.name: Hero Stalker
HeroStalker.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 150%.

FeedingFrenzy.name: Feeding Frenzy
FeedingFrenzy.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

EssenceDevourer.name: Essence Devourer
EssenceDevourer.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence and increase your maximum Essence by 1, to a maximum of 10 increased Essence. Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, the amount of Essence you gain from Regeneration Globes is increased to 15.

Isolation.name: Isolation
Isolation.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

SwiftPursuit.name: Swift Pursuit
SwiftPursuit.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 20% while in a bush and 2 seconds after leaving.

FerociousStalker.name: Ferocious Stalker
FerociousStalker.description: Brushstalker increases your Movement Speed by 60% decaying over 3 seconds.

WhirlingDervish.name: Whirling Dervish
WhirlingDervish.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero while Dark Storm is active by 50%.

ParalyzingEnzymes.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
ParalyzingEnzymes.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

RapidRegeneration.name: Rapid Regeneration
RapidRegeneration.description: Burrow heals you for 789 (375 + 0% per level) Health over 2 seconds.

Contagion.name: Contagion
Contagion.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

ChangeIsSurvival.name: Change Is Survival
ChangeIsSurvival.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 125% of the damage received.

ApexPredator.name: Apex Predator
ApexPredator.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

SoulFeast.name: Soul Feast
SoulFeast.description: Black Soulstone increases your Health Regeneration by 3% per Soul.

DevilsDue.name: Devil's Due
DevilsDue.description: Reduces Black Soulstone's resurrection cost to 60 Souls.

OverwhelmingForce.name: Overwhelming Force
OverwhelmingForce.description: Increases the range and knockback of Shadow Charge by 25%.

DemonicStrength.name: Demonic Strength
DemonicStrength.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

SoulCatcher.name: Soul Catcher
SoulCatcher.description: Black Soulstone passively generates a Soul every 4 seconds.

FireDevil.name: Fire Devil
FireDevil.description: Fire Stomp also surrounds you in flames that deal 23 damage every second for 6 seconds.

EssenceoftheSlain.name: Essence of the Slain
EssenceoftheSlain.description: When enemy Minions, captured Mercenaries, and Heroes die near you, gain 26.47 Health and 10 Mana.

DiabolicalMomentum.name: Diabolical Momentum
DiabolicalMomentum.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

SoulSteal.name: Soul Steal
SoulSteal.description: Increases the amount of Health gained from Black Soulstone by 50%.

FromtheShadows.name: From the Shadows
FromtheShadows.description: Enemies knocked against unpathable locations are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

DevastatingCharge.name: Devastating Charge
DevastatingCharge.description: Shadow Charge reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50% for 6 seconds.

Apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
Apocalypse.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

LightningBreath.name: Lightning Breath
LightningBreath.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

LifeLeech.name: Life Leech
LifeLeech.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal you for the same amount.

Firestorm.name: Firestorm
Firestorm.description: Fire Stomp waves return to you, dealing 125% damage.

SiphontheDead.name: Siphon the Dead
SiphontheDead.description: Activate to heal 15.6% of your maximum Health over 3 seconds.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 20% and Basic Attack damage by 50% for 2 seconds.

Domination.name: Domination
Domination.description: Overpower reduces the cooldown of Shadow Charge by 10 seconds.

ImposingPresence.name: Imposing Presence
ImposingPresence.description: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

DyingBreath.name: Dying Breath
DyingBreath.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when you die.

Hellstorm.name: Hellstorm
Hellstorm.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

LordofTerror.name: Lord of Terror
LordofTerror.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

GuitarHero.name: Guitar Hero
GuitarHero.description: While Guitar Solo is active, you heal for 30% of the damage dealt by Basic Attacks. Also increases the Attack Speed bonus of Rockstar by 5%.

ProgRock.name: Prog Rock
ProgRock.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100. Reward: After reaching 100 increased healing, Guitar Solar also helas nearby allied Heroes for 117 (56 + 4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

BlockParty.name: Block Party
BlockParty.description: Rockstar also grants allies a stack of Block, reducing the damage they take from the next Basic Attack by 50% for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

CrowdSurfer.name: Crowd Surfer
CrowdSurfer.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

LoudSpeakers.name: Loud Speakers
LoudSpeakers.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

SpeedMetal.name: Speed Metal
SpeedMetal.description: Rockstar also gives 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

PinballWizard.name: Pinball Wizard
PinballWizard.description: Face Melt does 150% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

EchoPedal.name: Echo Pedal
EchoPedal.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability releases two pulses of 71 (34 + 4% per level) damage. This deals 100% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

Hammeron.name: Hammer-on
Hammeron.description: After using an Ability, your next 2 Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage.

MoshPit.name: Mosh Pit
MoshPit.description: Cooldown: 120 secondsAfter 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

StageDive.name: Stage Dive
StageDive.description: Cooldown: 75 secondsLeap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 724 (330 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

MicCheck.name: Mic Check
MicCheck.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

Encore.name: Encore
Encore.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

FaceSmelt.name: Face Smelt
FaceSmelt.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 60% fading over 2 seconds.

ShowStopper.name: Show Stopper
ShowStopper.description: Reduces all damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds after using Powerslide.

AggressiveShredding.name: Aggressive Shredding
AggressiveShredding.description: Your Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 1 second.

TourBus.name: Tour Bus
TourBus.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. You can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

CrowdPleaser.name: Crowd Pleaser
CrowdPleaser.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

DeathMetal.name: Death Metal
DeathMetal.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at your location.

StormShield.name: Storm Shield
StormShield.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Reinforce.name: Reinforce
Reinforce.description: Using Basic Abilities reduces the next Basic Attack against you by 50%.  Maximum 2 stacks.

RighteousSmash.name: Righteous Smash
RighteousSmash.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

KnightTakesPawn.name: Knight Takes Pawn
KnightTakesPawn.description: Condemn deals 165 additional damage to Minions and Mercenaries and stuns them for 3 seconds.

AmplifiedHealing.name: Amplified Healing
AmplifiedHealing.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

EternalRetaliation.name: Eternal Retaliation
EternalRetaliation.description: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

LawsofHope.name: Laws of Hope
LawsofHope.description: Regenerating 10 Health per second.Activate to heal 20% of your max Health over 4 seconds.

BlessedMomentum.name: Blessed Momentum
BlessedMomentum.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

Conviction.name: Conviction
Conviction.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

TheCrusadeMarchesOn.name: The Crusade Marches On
TheCrusadeMarchesOn.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

SinsExposed.name: Sins Exposed
SinsExposed.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 68 extra damage and the mark is removed.

FallingSword.name: Falling Sword
FallingSword.description: You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds you land, dealing 356 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

BlessedShield.name: Blessed Shield
BlessedShield.description: Deal 114 damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

HoldYourGround.name: Hold Your Ground
HoldYourGround.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 20%, and if the Shield is destroyed by damage the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

Subdue.name: Subdue
Subdue.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

HolyRenewal.name: Holy Renewal
HolyRenewal.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare heals you for 114.

BlessedHammer.name: Blessed Hammer
BlessedHammer.description: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around you, dealing 41 damage to enemies it hits.

Fanaticism.name: Fanaticism
Fanaticism.description: While Iron Skin is active, gain 8% Movement Speed each time you take damage.  Stacks up to 40%.

HeavensFury.name: Heaven's Fury
HeavensFury.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.

RadiatingFaith.name: Radiating Faith
RadiatingFaith.description: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

Indestructible.name: Indestructible
Indestructible.description: Upon taking fatal damage, gain a Shield equal to your maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

ManaThirst.name: Mana Thirst
ManaThirst.description: Skeletal Swing restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

Hopelessness.name: Hopelessness
Hopelessness.description: Increases the range of Drain Hope by 20%.

Reanimation.name: Reanimation
Reanimation.description: You can gather Regeneration Globes while Undying. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Glove increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Globes, you also respawn 10 seconds faster.

FealtyUntoDeath.name: Fealty Unto Death
FealtyUntoDeath.description: When a nearby Minion dies, you restore 1% of your maximum Health and 5 Mana. Half as effective while Undying.

WillingVessel.name: Willing Vessel
WillingVessel.description: Increases the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of your maximum Health and Drain Essence to 12.5% of your maximum Health.

HardenedBones.name: Hardened Bones
HardenedBones.description: During Wraith Walk, you take 25% less damage.

RoyalFocus.name: Royal Focus
RoyalFocus.description: If your body takes no damage during Wraith Walk's duration, the cooldown is reduced to 4 seconds.

GhastlyReach.name: Ghastly Reach
GhastlyReach.description: Increases the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

LingeringApparition.name: Lingering Apparition
LingeringApparition.description: Increases the duration of Wraith Walk by 80%.

ParalyzingRage.name: Paralyzing Rage
ParalyzingRage.description: Increases the Movement Speed slow of Skeletal Swing to 60%.

OsseinRenewal.name: Ossein Renewal
OsseinRenewal.description: Activate to heal 20% of your maximum life over 6 seconds. Half as effective while Undying.

Entomb.name: Entomb
Entomb.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

MarchoftheBlackKing.name: March of the Black King
MarchoftheBlackKing.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 401 (191 + 4% per level) damage.

CrushingHope.name: Crushing Hope
CrushingHope.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the victim's Maximum Health. This damage does not heal you.

DrainMomentum.name: Drain Momentum
DrainMomentum.description: Drain Hope now increases your Movement Speed by 10% instead of reducing it.

RenewedSwing.name: Renewed Swing
RenewedSwing.description: Skeletal Swing can be recast again for free within 3 seconds for 50% damage.

ConsumeVitality.name: Consume Vitality
ConsumeVitality.description: Skeletal Swing heals you for 2% of your maximum Health per target hit, up to 10%. Half as effective while Undying.

UnyieldingDespair.name: Unyielding Despair
UnyieldingDespair.description: Every second Drain Hope is active, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

BuriedAlive.name: Buried Alive
BuriedAlive.description: Enemies inside Entomb take 198 (94 + 4% per level) damage per second.

DeathMarch.name: Death March
DeathMarch.description: Your final swing of March of the Black King also applies the base version of Drain Hope to all enemy Heroes in a large area.

SpectralLeech.name: Spectral Leech
SpectralLeech.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal you for the same amount.

InfusedHammer.name: Infused Hammer
InfusedHammer.description: Refunds 45 Mana for each enemy hit.

PerfectStorm.name: Perfect Storm
PerfectStorm.description: Reduces Storm Bolt's Mana cost by 25%. Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

Reverberation.name: Reverberation
Reverberation.description: Enemies hit by Thunder Clap have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.

ThirdWind.name: Third Wind
ThirdWind.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 169 (81 + 4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 50% Health for improved 336 (160 + 4% per level) per second Restoration.

Sledgehammer.name: Sledgehammer
Sledgehammer.description: Deals 400% damage to Minions, Structures and Mercenaries. Destroys 4 ammo from Structures.

CrowdControl.name: Crowd Control
CrowdControl.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

ThunderBurn.name: Thunder Burn
ThunderBurn.description: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground taht explodes after 2 seconds dealing 106 (50 + 4% per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.

PiercingBolt.name: Piercing Bolt
PiercingBolt.description: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.

LandingMomentum.name: Landing Momentum
LandingMomentum.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 20% for 4 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss.

Skullcracker.name: Skullcracker
Skullcracker.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target will stun them for 0.25 seconds.

BattleMomentum.name: Battle Momentum
BattleMomentum.description: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

Avatar.name: Avatar
Avatar.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1022 Health and causing your Basic Attacks to stun enemies.

Haymaker.name: Haymaker
Haymaker.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 damage and knocking them aside.

HealingStatic.name: Healing Static
HealingStatic.description: Heal for 1.5% of your Max Health for each target hit by Thunder Clap.

ThunderStrike.name: Thunder Strike
ThunderStrike.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

DwarfLaunch.name: Dwarf Launch
DwarfLaunch.description: Increases the range and impact radius of Dwarf Toss by 50%.

HeavyImpact.name: Heavy Impact
HeavyImpact.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are stunned for 0.75 seconds.

GiveemtheAxe.name: Give 'em the Axe!
GiveemtheAxe.description: Basic Attacks deal 75% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

Stoneform.name: Stoneform
Stoneform.description: Activate to heal for 50% of your maximum Health over 8 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

UnstoppableForce.name: Unstoppable Force
UnstoppableForce.description: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Disables are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.

GrandSlam.name: Grand Slam
GrandSlam.description: Damage of Haymaker increased by 25%, Mana cost lowered by 40, and can store 2 charges.

GrizzledBear.name: Grizzled Bear
GrizzledBear.description: Misha periodically reduces the damage received from Hero Basic Attacks by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

HunterGatherer.name: Hunter-Gatherer
HunterGatherer.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Globes, Rexxar gains 600 maximum Health.

Flare.name: Flare
Flare.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 5 seconds.

HungryBear.name: Hungry Bear
HungryBear.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 3.9% of her maximum Health.

CripplingTalons.name: Crippling Talons
CripplingTalons.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 40% and its duration to 3 seconds.

TakingFlight.name: Taking Flight
TakingFlight.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded.

EasyPrey.name: Easy Prey
EasyPrey.description: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and reduces the damage Misha takes from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

BloodoftheRhino.name: Blood of the Rhino
BloodoftheRhino.description: Increases Mend Pet's duration by 5 seconds.

ThrowingAxes.name: Throwing Axes
ThrowingAxes.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 25%.

AspectoftheBeast.name: Aspect of the Beast
AspectoftheBeast.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.5 seconds.

BirdofPrey.name: Bird of Prey
BirdofPrey.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 200% to non-Heroic enemies.

BestialWrath.name: Bestial Wrath
BestialWrath.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

UnleashtheBoars.name: Unleash the Boars
UnleashtheBoars.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

WildfireBear.name: Wildfire Bear
WildfireBear.description: Misha deals 28 damage per second to nearby enemies.

ThrilloftheHunt.name: Thrill of the Hunt
ThrilloftheHunt.description: Your Basic Attacks increase both you and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

BearNecessities.name: Bear Necessities
BearNecessities.description: If Misha, Charge! doesn't hit an enemy Hero, it can be cast again for free for the next 3 seconds.

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description: Misha takes 50% less damage from Abilities for 5 seconds after using Misha, Charge!

CriticalCare.name: Critical Care
CriticalCare.description: Increases the healing of Mend Pet by 50% while Misha is under 50% health.

AspectoftheHawk.name: Aspect of the Hawk
AspectoftheHawk.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, you gain 100% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

PrimalIntimidation.name: Primal Intimidation
PrimalIntimidation.description: Enemies that Basic Attack you or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

FeignDeath.name: Feign Death
FeignDeath.description: Fake your death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

SpiritBond.name: Spirit Bond
SpiritBond.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

KillCommand.name: Kill Command
KillCommand.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

FrenzyofKalimdor.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
FrenzyofKalimdor.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

HardenedSkin.name: Hardened Skin
HardenedSkin.description: You and Misha take 75% less damage for 4 seconds.

WarPaint.name: War Paint
WarPaint.description: Basic Attacks heal you for 30% of the damage dealt.

ShotofFury.name: Shot of Fury
ShotofFury.description: Increases your maximum Fury by 50. You can also activate your Trait to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.

ShatteredGround.name: Shattered Ground
ShatteredGround.description: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

Hurricane.name: Hurricane
Hurricane.description: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 1 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

MercenaryLord.name: Mercenary Lord
MercenaryLord.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

PoisonedSpear.name: Poisoned Spear
PoisonedSpear.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 75% damage over 4 seconds.

CompositeSpear.name: Composite Spear
CompositeSpear.description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

FerociousHealing.name: Ferocious Healing
FerociousHealing.description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10.15% of your maximum Health.Usable while Whirlwinding.

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: Leap into the air, dealing 123 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

WrathoftheBerserker.name: Wrath of the Berserker
WrathoftheBerserker.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

LifeFunnel.name: Life Funnel
LifeFunnel.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 30%, tripled versus Heroes.

Aftershock.name: Aftershock
Aftershock.description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

MysticalSpear.name: Mystical Spear
MysticalSpear.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 3 seconds. You are pulled to the target location even if you don't hit an enemy.

FuriousBlow.name: Furious Blow
FuriousBlow.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 50%, but costs 40 Fury.

NoEscape.name: No Escape
NoEscape.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

NervesofSteel.name: Nerves of Steel
NervesofSteel.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

ArreatCrater.name: Arreat Crater
ArreatCrater.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds. Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

AngerManagement.name: Anger Management
AngerManagement.description: Increases all Fury generated during Wrath of the Berserker by 100%.

IgnorePain.name: Ignore Pain
IgnorePain.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

ChewYourFood.name: Chew Your Food
ChewYourFood.description: Using Devour also heals you for 9.555% of your max Health over 3.06 seconds.

HungryforMore.name: Hungry for More
HungryforMore.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases your maximum Health by 30.

VileCleaver.name: Vile Cleaver
VileCleaver.description: Basic Attacks create a cloud of Vile Gas on the target.

PutridGround.name: Putrid Ground
PutridGround.description: Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas.

SavortheFlavor.name: Savor the Flavor
SavortheFlavor.description: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases your Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

LastBite.name: Last Bite
LastBite.description: If an enemy dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by Devour, its cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds.

Tenderizer.name: Tenderizer
Tenderizer.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

ToxicGas.name: Toxic Gas
ToxicGas.description: Increases Vile Gas radius by 102.5% and the duration of the effect by 1 second.

PutridBile.name: Putrid Bile
PutridBile.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

Gorge.name: Gorge
Gorge.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

Relentless.name: Relentless
Relentless.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

MegaSmash.name: Mega Smash
MegaSmash.description: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

Indigestion.name: Indigestion
Indigestion.description: Using Devour also creates a Retchling that applies Vile Gas Poison when it attacks.

HelpingHand.name: Helping Hand
HelpingHand.description: Hook can also pull allied Heroes (but will not damage them). When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Pulverize.name: Pulverize
Pulverize.description: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

ShishKabob.name: Shish Kabob
ShishKabob.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

RegenerativeBile.name: Regenerative Bile
RegenerativeBile.description: Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer, grants an additional 10% Movement Speed and heals for 48.65% of the damage dealt.

HungryHungryStitches.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
HungryHungryStitches.description: While active, Gorge can be repeatedly recast until the first target is expelled. Increases Gorge damage by 40%.

PurgeEvil.name: Purge Evil
PurgeEvil.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

ProtectioninDeath.name: Protection in Death
ProtectioninDeath.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

EvenInDeath.name: Even In Death
EvenInDeath.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

HoradricReforging.name: Horadric Reforging
HoradricReforging.description: If El'druins Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

SwiftRetribution.name: Swift Retribution
SwiftRetribution.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

AngelsGrace.name: Angel's Grace
AngelsGrace.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

Reciprocate.name: Reciprocate
Reciprocate.description: When your shield expires, it explodes for 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Zealotry.name: Zealotry
Zealotry.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

Judgment.name: Judgment
Judgment.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage.

Sanctification.name: Sanctification
Sanctification.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

AngelicAbsorption.name: Angelic Absorption
AngelicAbsorption.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 138 Health over 3 seconds.

ImposingWill.name: Imposing Will
ImposingWill.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded have their Attack Speed and Movement Speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds.

AngelicMight.name: Angelic Might
AngelicMight.description: Gain 25% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each target hit by Smite.

BladeofJustice.name: Blade of Justice
BladeofJustice.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

HolyGround.name: Holy Ground
HolyGround.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'Druin's Might.

Salvation.name: Salvation
Salvation.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 35%.

AngelofJustice.name: Angel of Justice
AngelofJustice.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

HolyArena.name: Holy Arena
HolyArena.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

DemolitionsExpert.name: Demolitions Expert
DemolitionsExpert.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.375 seconds, up to 3 seconds.Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

TogetherWeAreStrong.name: Together We Are Strong
TogetherWeAreStrong.description: Every 22 (11 + 4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 25 Energy per shield.

FeeltheHeat.name: Feel the Heat
FeeltheHeat.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals -8.50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

MaximumCharge.name: Maximum Charge
MaximumCharge.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.Quest: Spend 120 seconds at or above 50 Energy.Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

IAmtheStrongest.name: I Am the Strongest
IAmtheStrongest.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage.

GiveMeTwenty.name: Give Me Twenty
GiveMeTwenty.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 3 seconds.

SpeedBarrier.name: Speed Barrier
SpeedBarrier.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 35% for the duration.

DefensiveShielding.name: Defensive Shielding
DefensiveShielding.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally reduce the damage of the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks within 12 seconds by 75%.

PinpointAccuracy.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
PinpointAccuracy.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

ExplosiveBarrier.name: Explosive Barrier
ExplosiveBarrier.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

TotheLimit.name: To the Limit
TotheLimit.description: While above 50 Energy your Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

HitMe.name: Hit Me
HitMe.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 20% more Energy.

GravitonSurge.name: Graviton Surge
GravitonSurge.description: Cooldown: 120 secondsLaunch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

ExpulsionZone.name: Expulsion Zone
ExpulsionZone.description: Cooldown: 45 secondsLaunch a gravity bomb that deals 272 (129 + 4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

UnstoppableCompetitor.name: Unstoppable Competitor
UnstoppableCompetitor.description: Personal Barrier makes you Unstoppable for up to 1.5 seconds.

SpellBarrier.name: Spell Barrier
SpellBarrier.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants a Spell Shield that reduces Ability Damage taken by 75% for 3 seconds.

EnduranceTraining.name: Endurance Training
EnduranceTraining.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains Resistant, reducing all damage taken by 25%.

PainisTemporary.name: Pain is Temporary
PainisTemporary.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsActivate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

PlasmaShock.name: Plasma Shock
PlasmaShock.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 1 second to enemies near the center.

CleansingShield.name: Cleansing Shield
CleansingShield.description: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects.

GainTrain.name: Gain Train
GainTrain.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

BorninBattle.name: Born in Battle
BorninBattle.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

GravityKills.name: Gravity Kills
GravityKills.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage over the duration.

ClearOut.name: Clear Out
ClearOut.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 10 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

Grenadier.name: Grenadier
Grenadier.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

UnyieldingDefender.name: Unyielding Defender
UnyieldingDefender.description: Cooldown: 45 secondsActivate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

SwiftSweep.name: Swift Sweep
SwiftSweep.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

IncreasingClarity.name: Increasing Clarity
IncreasingClarity.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 3 up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, the center damage bonus is doubled to 120.

RighteousAssault.name: Righteous Assault
RighteousAssault.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 2 seconds for each enemy Hero hit, up to a total of 4 seconds.

SearingLight.name: Searing Light
SearingLight.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

HeavyBurden.name: Heavy Burden
HeavyBurden.description: The enemy will be slowed by 35% for 3 seconds if Detainment Strike stuns the enemy.

RepeatedOffense.name: Repeated Offense
RepeatedOffense.description: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10 up to 100.Reward: After stunning 10 Heroes, increase the damage by an additional 100.

BurstingLight.name: Bursting Light
BurstingLight.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ray of Heaven by 2 seconds.

GlimmerofHope.name: Glimmer of Hope
GlimmerofHope.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of your next Ray of Heaven by 35%.

EnergizedCord.name: Energized Cord
EnergizedCord.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 30% of the damage against non-Heroes.Does not affect your Bestow Hope ally.

EmpathicLink.name: Empathic Link
EmpathicLink.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

Resurrect.name: Resurrect
Resurrect.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 3 seconds, bringing them back to life with 50% of their maximum health at the location where they died.

CrystalAegis.name: Crystal Aegis
CrystalAegis.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 592 (281 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

BlindingFlash.name: Blinding Flash
BlindingFlash.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 4 seconds.

ConvergingForce.name: Converging Force
ConvergingForce.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

PiercingLash.name: Piercing Lash
PiercingLash.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemies in a line.

RepellingStrike.name: Repelling Strike
RepellingStrike.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

ReservoirofHope.name: Reservoir of Hope
ReservoirofHope.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

WillofHeaven.name: Will of Heaven
WillofHeaven.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

WrathofHeaven.name: Wrath of Heaven
WrathofHeaven.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Ability Power.

LightSpeed.name: Light Speed
LightSpeed.description: Increases the healing of Resurrect to 100% of the ally's maximum Health, and they also gain 199.68% increased Movement Speed that decays over 4 seconds.

DiamondResolve.name: Diamond Resolve
DiamondResolve.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants a shield that reduces damage taken by 50% for 4 seconds.

AngelicFlight.name: Angelic Flight
AngelicFlight.description: Cooldown: 45 secondsActivate to fly to a chosen location.

ShieldofHope.name: Shield of Hope
ShieldofHope.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

DreamShot.name: Dream Shot
DreamShot.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

HyperShift.name: Hyper Shift
HyperShift.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.

ArcaneBarrage.name: Arcane Barrage
ArcaneBarrage.description: Increases the range of Arcane Flare by 50%.

UnstableAnomaly.name: Unstable Anomaly
UnstableAnomaly.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

ManicPixie.name: Manic Pixie
ManicPixie.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 228 (119 + 4% per level) over 4 seconds.

Peekaboo.name: Peekaboo!
Peekaboo.description: Phase Shifting to an ally reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

Mistified.name: Mistified
Mistified.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 second every time you cast a Basic Ability.

PhaseShield.name: Phase Shield
PhaseShield.description: After finishing the teleport, the target of your Phase Shift gains a 877 (416 + 4% per level) point Shield for 20 seconds.

Cleanse.name: Cleanse
Cleanse.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

BlinkHeal.name: Blink Heal
BlinkHeal.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 447 (213 + 4% per level).  Can store 2 charges.

EmeraldWind.name: Emerald Wind
EmeraldWind.description: reate an expanding nova of wind, dealing 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Also passively increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

StickyFlare.name: Sticky Flare
StickyFlare.description: Targets are slowed by 40% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

PixieBoost.name: Pixie Boost
PixieBoost.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

ShieldDust.name: Shield Dust
ShieldDust.description: Pixie Dust reduces Ability damage taken by 40%.

IceBlock.name: Ice Block
IceBlock.description: Cooldown: 60 secondsActivate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

GreaterPolymorph.name: Greater Polymorph
GreaterPolymorph.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 second.

Critterize.name: Critterize
Critterize.description: Polymorph makes enemies Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

BouncyDust.name: Bouncy Dust
BouncyDust.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

HardenedFocus.name: Hardened Focus
HardenedFocus.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

DoubleWyrmhole.name: Double Wyrmhole
DoubleWyrmhole.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

ContinuousWinds.name: Continuous Winds
ContinuousWinds.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage.

RevitalizingMist.name: Revitalizing Mist
RevitalizingMist.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 160 (76 + 4% per level).

IronFists.name: Iron Fists
IronFists.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 125% bonus damage.

Insight.name: Insight
Insight.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 31 ( 15 + 4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight. Reward: Once you have 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all your Basic Abilities by 1 second.

Foresight.name: Foresight
Foresight.description: Radiant Dash reveals the area around the target for 3 seconds. Only one area can be revealed at a time.

Overtake.name: Overtake
Overtake.description: Basic Attacks while Deadly Reach is active increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

HealingWard.name: Healing Ward
HealingWard.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their max Health every second for 10 seconds.

ProtectiveShield.name: Protective Shield
ProtectiveShield.description: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.

EchoofHeaven.name: Echo of Heaven
EchoofHeaven.description: Breath of Heaven heals a second time 2 seconds later for 50%.

WayoftheHundredFists.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
WayoftheHundredFists.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy causes you to launch of volley of blows dealing 540 (256 + 4% per level) total damage instead of a Basic Attack.

Clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.description: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

DivinePalm.name: Divine Palm
DivinePalm.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 2501 (1187 + 4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

SevenSidedStrike.name: Seven-Sided Strike
SevenSidedStrike.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives you and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

SoothingBreeze.name: Soothing Breeze
SoothingBreeze.description: Breath of Heaven removes silences, blinds, slows and roots.

CircleofLife.name: Circle of Life
CircleofLife.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's healing by 10% for each allied Hero in the cast range.

BlindingSpeed.name: Blinding Speed
BlindingSpeed.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

BlazingFists.name: Blazing Fists
BlazingFists.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 1 second.

PeacefulRepose.name: Peaceful Repose
PeacefulRepose.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

Epiphany.name: Epiphany
Epiphany.description: Activate to restore 32.81% of your maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

ProToss.name: Pro Toss
ProToss.description: Increases the range of Healing Brew by 30%.

TimelessCreature.name: Timeless Creature
TimelessCreature.description: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.

MendingSerpent.name: Mending Serpent
MendingSerpent.description: Cloud Serpent heals the friendly unit for 22 Health each time it attacks.

MassVortex.name: Mass Vortex
MassVortex.description: Increases the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 4.

LingeringBlind.name: Lingering Blind
LingeringBlind.description: Increases the duration of Blinding Wind by 50%.

PitchPerfect.name: Pitch Perfect
PitchPerfect.description: After casting Healing Brew, its cost is reduced by 10 Mana for 6 seconds.  This effect does not stack.

TheGoodStuff.name: The Good Stuff
TheGoodStuff.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 60 Health over 6 seconds.

LightningSerpent.name: Lightning Serpent
LightningSerpent.description: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing 15 damage each.

Jugof1000Cups.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
Jugof1000Cups.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a total of 1632 Health over 6 seconds.

WaterDragon.name: Water Dragon
WaterDragon.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing 318 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

ElusiveFeet.name: Elusive Feet
ElusiveFeet.description: When Fast Feet is triggered, gain 2 charges of Block (75% reduced Basic Attack damage) for 10 seconds. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

HinderingWinds.name: Hindering Winds
HinderingWinds.description: Blinding Wind also slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

SurgingWinds.name: Surging Winds
SurgingWinds.description: Gain 5% Ability Power for 8 seconds for every enemy hit by Blinding Wind. Additional enemies hit refresh the duration of this buff and further increase Ability Power. Stacks up to 4 times.

ShrinkRay.name: Shrink Ray
ShrinkRay.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

ShakeItOff.name: Shake It Off
ShakeItOff.description: Reduces the duration of the next Stun or Root against you by 75%. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds.

SafetySprint.name: Safety Sprint
SafetySprint.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of Fast Feet from 10% to 20% while under 50% Health.

TwoForOne.name: Two For One
TwoForOne.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

SerpentSidekick.name: Serpent Sidekick
SerpentSidekick.description: You also gain a Cloud Serpent whenever you cast it on another ally.

Jugof1000000Cups.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
Jugof1000000Cups.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups hits two targets at a time.

DoubleDragon.name: Double Dragon
DoubleDragon.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

KungFuHustle.name: Kung Fu Hustle
KungFuHustle.description: Ability cooldowns refresh 150% faster while Fast Feet is active.

TraumaTrigger.name: Trauma Trigger
TraumaTrigger.description: You gain an untalented Safeguard automatically if you take damage while below 50% Health. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

FeedbackLoop.name: Feedback Loop
FeedbackLoop.description: When Safeguard expires, 45 Mana is refunded.

Bioshield.name: Bioshield
Bioshield.description: If your target is at full Health, they gain a Shield that absorbs 78 damage, stacking up to 5 times.

AdvancedBlock.name: Advanced Block
AdvancedBlock.description: Periodically reduces the damage received from Hero Basic Attacks by 50%.  Stores up to 3 charges.

UpgradedBallistics.name: Upgraded Ballistics
UpgradedBallistics.description: Displacement Grenade travels 50% faster and enemies directly impacted take 33% more damage.

InfusedGrenade.name: Infused Grenade
InfusedGrenade.description: Displacement Grenade's Mana cost is refunded if you hit an enemy Hero.

Clear.name: Clear!
Clear.description: Displacement Grenade's explosion radius increased by 33% and knocks back farther.

Irradiate.name: Irradiate
Irradiate.description: Enemies near your Healing Beam's target take 22 damage a second.

CalldownMULE.name: Calldown: MULE
CalldownMULE.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

StimDrone.name: Stim Drone
StimDrone.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

MedivacDropship.name: Medivac Dropship
MedivacDropship.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10.5 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

IntensiveCare.name: Intensive Care
IntensiveCare.description: When Healing Beam is on a single target for over 3 seconds, its healing amount increases by 25% and Mana cost increases by 4.

CouplesTherapy.name: Couples Therapy
CouplesTherapy.description: While channeling Healing Beam you are healed for 25% of the healing amount at the cost of an additional 4 Mana per second.

PreventativeCare.name: Preventative Care
PreventativeCare.description: Basic Attacks against your Healing Beam target reduce the attacker's Attack Speed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

Inoculation.name: Inoculation
Inoculation.description: Increases Safeguard's initial damage reduction to 50% for the first 1.5 seconds.

ShieldSequencer.name: Shield Sequencer
ShieldSequencer.description: After casting Safeguard, you can cast it a second time within 3 seconds at no cost.

SystemShock.name: System Shock
SystemShock.description: Displacement Grenade slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds. The slow amount decays over its duration.

SecondOpinion.name: Second Opinion
SecondOpinion.description: Reduces Displacement Grenade's cooldown by 2 seconds and it now holds a second charge.

Transfusion.name: Transfusion
Transfusion.description: Increases the duration of Stim Drone by 2 seconds.  You also gain the effect of Stim Drone when cast on an ally.

Medbay.name: Medbay
Medbay.description: Medivac heals nearby allies and everyone aboard for 137 Health per second.

CaduceusReactor20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
CaduceusReactor20.description: While Caduceus Reactor is active you restore 8 Mana a second and gain a Shield that absorbs 96 damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Moonburn.name: Moonburn
Moonburn.description: Increases Moonfire's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.

ElunesGrace.name: Elune's Grace
ElunesGrace.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 30%.

Versatile.name: Versatile
Versatile.description: Increases the Mana return of Innervate to 25%.

VengefulRoots.name: Vengeful Roots
VengefulRoots.description: Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant that does 141 (67 + 4% per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.

Tranquility.name: Tranquility
Tranquility.description: Cooldown: 100 secondsHeals 176 (84 + 4% per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

TwilightDream.name: Twilight Dream
TwilightDream.description: Cooldown: 90 secondsAfter a short delay, deal 820 (389 + 4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Also passively increases your Mana Regeneration by 1.5.

LifeSeed.name: Life Seed
LifeSeed.description: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

FullMoonfire.name: Full Moonfire
FullMoonfire.description: Increases Moonfire's radius by 60% and reduces its Mana cost by 50%.

TenaciousRoots.name: Tenacious Roots
TenaciousRoots.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.5 seconds longer.

HinderingMoonfire.name: Hindering Moonfire
HinderingMoonfire.description: Moonfire slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds.

LunarShower.name: Lunar Shower
LunarShower.description: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of your next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

Serenity.name: Serenity
Serenity.description: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description: Increases Twilight Dream's silence duration to 4 seconds and it also slows enemies by 50%.

ColossalTotem.name: Colossal Totem
ColossalTotem.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

ElectricCharge.name: Electric Charge
ElectricCharge.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

WolfRun.name: Wolf Run
WolfRun.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 30% to 40%.

LightningBond.name: Lightning Bond
LightningBond.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also cast an untalented version on you.

SpiritwalkersGrace.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
SpiritwalkersGrace.description: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 65 to 45.

FeralHeart.name: Feral Heart
FeralHeart.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

Stormcaller.name: Stormcaller
Stormcaller.description: Reduces Lightning Shield's Mana cost from 60 to 35.

HealingTotem.name: Healing Totem
HealingTotem.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their max Health every second for 10 seconds.

BloodandThunder.name: Blood and Thunder
BloodandThunder.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

Farsight.name: Farsight
Farsight.description: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

TotemicProjection.name: Totemic Projection
TotemicProjection.description: Reactivate Earthbind Totem to move an existing totem to a new location once.

AncestralHealing.name: Ancestral Healing
AncestralHealing.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 Health.

Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 30% Movement Speed. Lasts for 10 seconds.

EarthShield.name: Earth Shield
EarthShield.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

TidalWaves.name: Tidal Waves
TidalWaves.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

EarthlivingEnchant.name: Earthliving Enchant
EarthlivingEnchant.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 439 Health over 5 seconds.

EarthgraspTotem.name: Earthgrasp Totem
EarthgraspTotem.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1.5 second.

HungeroftheWolf.name: Hunger of the Wolf
HungeroftheWolf.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal you for 5% of your maximum Health.

RisingStorm.name: Rising Storm
RisingStorm.description: Every time Lightning Shield damage an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

FarseersBlessing.name: Farseer's Blessing
FarseersBlessing.description: Increases healing amount by 50%. Allies near the target are healed for 25% of the amount of health regained.

GladiatorsWarShout.name: Gladiator's War Shout
GladiatorsWarShout.description: All alies affected by Bloodlust now heal for 30% of their Basic Attack damage done to their primary target.

PsiInfusion.name: Psi-Infusion
PsiInfusion.description: Psionic Storm returns 5 Mana for each target initally hit.

ReinforceStructure.name: Reinforce Structure
ReinforceStructure.description: Plasma Shield is 100% stronger and lasts 100% longer when cast on Structures.

LeechingPlasma.name: Leeching Plasma
LeechingPlasma.description: While Plasma Shield is active, 30% of the target's Basic Attack damage against the primary target is returned as Health.

MentalAcuity.name: Mental Acuity
MentalAcuity.description: Reduces the cooldown of Oracle by 20 seconds.

Promote.name: Promote
Promote.description: Activate to cause an allied lane Minion to take 75% reduced damage from non-Heroic targets and deal 100% bonus damage to non-Heroic targets for 30 seconds. Has 2 charges.

KhalasEmbrace.name: Khala's Embrace
KhalasEmbrace.description: If Plasma Shield expires, 50% of the Shield remains indefinitely. This effect does not stack.

DeepShift.name: Deep Shift
DeepShift.description: Dimensional Shift duration increased by 1.5 seconds.

StaticCharge.name: Static Charge
StaticCharge.description: Enemies damaged by Psionic Storm are marked with Static Charge. Your Basic Attacks consume the Static Charge to deal 52 damage.

Archon.name: Archon
Archon.description: Transform into an Archon, gaining a 456 point Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal 111 damage and splash for 55 additional damage. Lasts for 12.5 seconds.

ForceWall.name: Force Wall
ForceWall.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.5 seconds.

DistortionBeam.name: Distortion Beam
DistortionBeam.description: Basic Attacks slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

Prescience.name: Prescience
Prescience.description: Dimensional Shift will automatically activate when you fall below 15% Health. This effect has a separate 45 second cooldown.

Scryer.name: Scryer
Scryer.description: Oracle duration increased by 3 seconds and grants 20% increased Movement Speed.

EvasiveShielding.name: Evasive Shielding
EvasiveShielding.description: The target of your Plasma Shield also gains 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

DimensionalWarp.name: Dimensional Warp
DimensionalWarp.description: While Dimensional Shifted, gain 50% Movement Speed and heal for 384 Health.

Resonation.name: Resonation
Resonation.description: Psionic Storm targets are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

SecondStrike.name: Second Strike
SecondStrike.description: After casting Psionic Storm, you may cast Psionic Storm again for free within 3 seconds. The damage does not stack.

TwilightArchon.name: Twilight Archon
TwilightArchon.description: Increases Archon's initial Shield and Attack Damage by 50%, and increases Basic Attack range in Archon form by 35%.

ForceBarrier.name: Force Barrier
ForceBarrier.description: Force Wall range increased by 50% and duration by 1 second.

CelestialAttunement.name: Celestial Attunement
CelestialAttunement.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Light of Elune by 15.

RangersMark.name: Ranger's Mark
RangersMark.description: Lower the Cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 6 seconds.

Empower.name: Empower
Empower.description: When Sentinel impacts, your cooldowns are instantly reduced by 2 seconds.

Pierce.name: Pierce
Pierce.description: Sentinel no longer stops at the first Hero hit, affecting all enemy Heroes along the path.

SearingArrows.name: Searing Arrows
SearingArrows.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds.  Each attack costs 10 Mana.

QuickeningBlessing.name: Quickening Blessing
QuickeningBlessing.description: If cast on an ally, Light of Elune also increases their Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

LunarBlaze.name: Lunar Blaze
LunarBlaze.description: Increases the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

LunarMomentum.name: Lunar Momentum
LunarMomentum.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

Shadowstalk.name: Shadowstalk
Shadowstalk.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 256 over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 100 healing.

Starfall.name: Starfall
Starfall.description: Deal 91 damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

OverflowingLight.name: Overflowing Light
OverflowingLight.description: When you are above 50% Health, Light of Elune's allied heal is increased by 30%.

HuntressFury.name: Huntress' Fury
HuntressFury.description: Gain 40% additional Attack Speed for 5 seconds when using Hunter's Mark.

Sprint.name: Sprint
Sprint.description: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

TrueshotAura.name: Trueshot Aura
TrueshotAura.description: You passively grant 15% Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes.

MarkofMending.name: Mark of Mending
MarkofMending.description: Basic Attacks against Marked targets heal for 2.5% maximum Health.

Ranger.name: Ranger
Ranger.description: Increases width of Sentinel by 100%. Increases damage dealt based on distance traveled, up to a maximum of +200% damage.

ShootingStar.name: Shooting Star
ShootingStar.description: Lunar Flare does 50% more damage. Hitting an enemy Hero will also refund the mana cost.

HuntersSwiftness.name: Hunter's Swiftness
HuntersSwiftness.description: When using Shadowstalk, you and allied Heroes gain 30% Movement Speed for 8 seconds.

CelestialWrath.name: Celestial Wrath
CelestialWrath.description: Starfall can be cast globally. Damage is increased by 30%.

FistofJustice.name: Fist of Justice
FistofJustice.description: Basic Attacks reduce cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1 second.

WaveofLight.name: Wave of Light
WaveofLight.description: Each Hero healed by Holy Radiance returns 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown by 1 second, up to a maximum of 50 Mana and 5 seconds.

BoundlessConviction.name: Boundless Conviction
BoundlessConviction.description: Increases the width and length of Holy Radiance by 40%.

BeaconofLight.name: Beacon of Light
BeaconofLight.description: You heal yourself for 30% of all healing done to allied Heroes.

BurdenofGuilt.name: Burden of Guilt
BurdenofGuilt.description: After Hammer of Justice's stun fades, the enemy's Movement Speed is slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

HolyFire.name: Holy Fire
HolyFire.description: Deal 40 (19 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

DivineShield.name: Divine Shield
DivineShield.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

DivineStorm.name: Divine Storm
DivineStorm.description: Deal 187 damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

BlessedChampion.name: Blessed Champion
BlessedChampion.description: After usding Holy Light, your Basic Attacks heal you and nearby allied Heroes for 20% of the healed amount. Last 5 seconds.

HolyShock.name: Holy Shock
HolyShock.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 49.88% of its healing amount as damage and with 6 seconds less cooldown. When used this way, your next Holy Light heals for 50% more.

GatheringRadiance.name: Gathering Radiance
GatheringRadiance.description: Each Hero that Holy Radiance passes through increases the healing and damage of your next Holy Radiance by 8%, to a maximum of 80% increase.

RighteousDefense.name: Righteous Defense
RighteousDefense.description: Healing a Hero with Holy Light reduces all damage they take by 50% for 2 seconds.

Benediction.name: Benediction
Benediction.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of your next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

BulwarkofLight.name: Bulwark of Light
BulwarkofLight.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

DivineHurricane.name: Divine Hurricane
DivineHurricane.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, return to 50% of your maximum Health at your spirit's location. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

PressurizedGlands.name: Pressurized Glands
PressurizedGlands.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

SurvivalInstincts.name: Survival Instincts
SurvivalInstincts.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

RegenerativeMicrobes.name: Regenerative Microbes
RegenerativeMicrobes.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 149 (71 + 4% per level) Health per second.

EnvenomedNest.name: Envenomed Nest
EnvenomedNest.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

ProlificDispersal.name: Prolific Dispersal
ProlificDispersal.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

Ballistospores.name: Ballistospores
Ballistospores.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

SustainedCarapace.name: Sustained Carapace
SustainedCarapace.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

AdrenalOverload.name: Adrenal Overload
AdrenalOverload.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

Needlespine.name: Needlespine
Needlespine.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

VileNest.name: Vile Nest
VileNest.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

NetworkedCarapace.name: Networked Carapace
NetworkedCarapace.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

UltimateEvolution.name: Ultimate Evolution
UltimateEvolution.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

EvolveMonstrosity.name: Evolve Monstrosity
EvolveMonstrosity.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.

AssaultStrain.name: Assault Strain
AssaultStrain.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 224 (107 + 4% per level) damage.

BombardStrain.name: Bombard Strain
BombardStrain.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

SomaTransference.name: Soma Transference
SomaTransference.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 141 (67 + 4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

EnvenomedSpikes.name: Envenomed Spikes
EnvenomedSpikes.description: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

AdrenalineBoost.name: Adrenaline Boost
AdrenalineBoost.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

LocustBrood.name: Locust Brood
LocustBrood.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

VolatileMutation.name: Volatile Mutation
VolatileMutation.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

EvolutionaryLink.name: Evolutionary Link
EvolutionaryLink.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

EvolutionComplete.name: Evolution Complete
EvolutionComplete.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

Hivemind.name: Hivemind
Hivemind.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first.

LocustNest.name: Locust Nest
LocustNest.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

TasteforBlood.name: Taste for Blood
TasteforBlood.description: Quest: Enemies that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation increase its damage by 2, up to 500.

SiegingWrath.name: Sieging Wrath
SiegingWrath.description: Quest: Every time Golbe of Annihilation hits an Hero, its damage is increased by 4 up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

MasterofDestruction.name: Master of Destruction
MasterofDestruction.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Each charge level also increases the range by 10%.

Gluttony.name: Gluttony
Gluttony.description: All Shall Burn heals you for 20% of the damage dealt.

ArmyofHell.name: Army of Hell
ArmyofHell.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

SinsGrasp.name: Sin's Grasp
SinsGrasp.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 543 (258 + 4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

InfernalGlobe.name: Infernal Globe
InfernalGlobe.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

BoundMinion.name: Bound Minion
BoundMinion.description: Using General of Hell on a Lane Minion decreases the non-Heroic damage they take by 75% and increases the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

GluttonousWard.name: Gluttonous Ward
GluttonousWard.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of your maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds.

MarchofSin.name: March of Sin
MarchofSin.description: Azmodan can move at 75% speed while channeling All Shall Burn.

DemonicInvasion.name: Demonic Invasion
DemonicInvasion.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 60 (29 + 4% per level) damage and have 800 (380 + 4% per level) health. Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

BlackPool.name: Black Pool
BlackPool.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

HellforgedArmor.name: Hellforged Armor
HellforgedArmor.description: Demon Warriors deal 10 damage to nearby enemies every second and take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

Hedonism.name: Hedonism
Hedonism.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

InfusedPower.name: Infused Power
InfusedPower.description: All Shall Burn gains an additional charge level, increasing its maximum damage by 40%.

Battleborn.name: Battleborn
Battleborn.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

DemonicSmite.name: Demonic Smite
