DemonicSmite.description: Demon Lieutenants will periodically blast enemy Minions with demonic energy, dealing 411 damage.

SinforSin.name: Sin for Sin
SinforSin.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

PerishingFlame.name: Perishing Flame
PerishingFlame.description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 damage to nearby enemies.

FifthCircle.name: Fifth Circle
FifthCircle.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

ForcedRecruitment.name: Forced Recruitment
ForcedRecruitment.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

ExtraTNT.name: Extra TNT
ExtraTNT.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

ScrapoMaticSmelter.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
ScrapoMaticSmelter.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

BreakitDown.name: Break it Down!
BreakitDown.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3.07 seconds.

ClockwerkSteamFists.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
ClockwerkSteamFists.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 2 seconds.Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

ArkReaktor.name: Ark Reaktor
ArkReaktor.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds. If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, you gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

ReduceReuseRecycle.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
ReduceReuseRecycle.description: Enemy Minions that die near you have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

RockItTurretXL.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
RockItTurretXL.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additonal enemies for 60% damage.

EngineGunk.name: Engine Gunk
EngineGunk.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

HyperfocusCoils.name: Hyperfocus Coils
HyperfocusCoils.description: Deth Lazor charges twice as fast.

RoboGoblin.name: Robo-Goblin
RoboGoblin.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 150% damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures.

GravOBomb3000.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
GravOBomb3000.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage.

TurretStorage.name: Turret Storage
TurretStorage.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

EZPZDimensionalRipper.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
EZPZDimensionalRipper.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 40% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

XTraLargeBombs.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
XTraLargeBombs.description: Increases Xplodium Charge range and radius by 25%.

SuperiorSchematics.name: Superior Schematics
SuperiorSchematics.description: Increase Rock-It! Turrets damage by 25% when you are within their attack range.

GoblinFusion.name: Goblin Fusion
GoblinFusion.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

KwikReleaseCharge.name: Kwik Release Charge
KwikReleaseCharge.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

MechaLord.name: Mecha-Lord
MechaLord.description: Basic attacks deal an additional 150% damage to Heroes.

MiniatureBlackHole.name: Miniature Black Hole
MiniatureBlackHole.description: Grav-O-Bomb radius increased by 25% and damage increased by 50%.

FirinMahLazorz.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
FirinMahLazorz.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of your Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage.

ItsRainingScrap.name: It's Raining Scrap
ItsRainingScrap.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap near you over 5 seconds.

PortalMastery.name: Portal Mastery
PortalMastery.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations. Activate your Trait to cancel an unliked Portal.

RavensIntellect.name: Raven's Intellect
RavensIntellect.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana Regeneration by 100%.

MageArmor.name: Mage Armor
MageArmor.description: Allies gain Block the first time they use a Portal reducing damage taken from the next 3 enemy Heroic Basic Attacks by 50%. Lasts 5 seconds.

BirdsEyeView.name: Bird's Eye View
BirdsEyeView.description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

DustofAppearance.name: Dust of Appearance
DustofAppearance.description: Activate to reveal enemy Heroes in the area surrounding Medivh for 10 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.

ArcaneCharge.name: Arcane Charge
ArcaneCharge.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 25% more damage.

TheMastersTouch.name: The Master's Touch
TheMastersTouch.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

ArcaneExplosion.name: Arcane Explosion
ArcaneExplosion.description: The first time Force of Will absorbs damage, it deals 401 (191 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

RavenFamiliar.name: Raven Familiar
RavenFamiliar.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies that use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack target for 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage.

PolyBomb.name: Poly Bomb
PolyBomb.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silecing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

LeyLineSeal.name: Ley Line Seal
LeyLineSeal.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

WindsofCelerity.name: Winds of Celerity
WindsofCelerity.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

CircleofProtection.name: Circle of Protection
CircleofProtection.description: An untalented Force of Will is also applied to allies near the target.

EnduringWill.name: Enduring Will
EnduringWill.description: Increases Force of Will duration by 33.33%

Reabsorption.name: Reabsorption
Reabsorption.description: Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 50% of the damage it absorbed.

GlyphofPolyBomb.name: Glyph of Poly Bomb
GlyphofPolyBomb.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

MedivhCheats.name: Medivh Cheats!
MedivhCheats.description: Increase the duration of the Stasis effect by 33.33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's activate.

GuardianofTirisfal.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
GuardianofTirisfal.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

ArcaneBrilliance.name: Arcane Brilliance
ArcaneBrilliance.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 Mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Ability Power for 10 seconds.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds.

Fishtank.name: Fishtank
Fishtank.description: Every 5 seconds, reduce the damage taken from the next Hero Basic Attack by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

BubbleBreeze.name: Bubble Breeze
BubbleBreeze.description: Gain 20% Movement Speed while in Safety Bubble.

AssaultEgg.name: Assault Egg
AssaultEgg.description: Health and sight range of Egg increased by 150%.

Tufferfish.name: Tufferfish
Tufferfish.description: Pufferfish take an additional attack before being disarmed.

LivingTheDream.name: Living The Dream
LivingTheDream.description: You gain 5% Ability Power. Quest: Every 5 seconds you are alive you gain an additional 1% Ability Power, up to an additional 15%. These stacks are lost on death.

SlimeAdvantage.name: Slime Advantage
SlimeAdvantage.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage to Slimed targets.

HinderingSlime.name: Hindering Slime
HinderingSlime.description: Increases the slow amount of Slime from 20% to 30%.

CompressedAir.name: Compressed Air
CompressedAir.description: Area of effect of Pufferfish increased by 50%.

MarchoftheMurlocs.name: March of the Murlocs
MarchoftheMurlocs.description: Command a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 95 damage and slow its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Does half damage to Structures.

OctoGrab.name: Octo-Grab
OctoGrab.description: Summon an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.06 seconds while you hit them for 1 damage a second.

ContinuousSlime.name: Continuous Slime
ContinuousSlime.description: Decreases the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 3 seconds.

WrathofCod.name: Wrath of Cod
WrathofCod.description: Increase Pufferfish's damage by 35% against Slimed targets.

BubbleMachine.name: Bubble Machine
BubbleMachine.description: Safety Bubble cooldown reduced by 5 seconds.

HiddenAssault.name: Hidden Assault
HiddenAssault.description: When you respawn from the Egg, you gain Stealth and 20% Movement Speed for 5.125 seconds.

SlimyPufferfish.name: Slimy Pufferfish
SlimyPufferfish.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

RejuvenatingBubble.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
RejuvenatingBubble.description: Safety Bubble restores 50% of your Health.

NeverEndingMurlocs.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
NeverEndingMurlocs.description: Murlocs from March of the Murlocs travel farther and cling to targets for 2 seconds longer.

AndASharkToo.name: ... And A Shark Too!
AndASharkToo.description: Increases the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

Widowmakers.name: Widowmakers
Widowmakers.description: Quest: After hitting Heroes 100 times with Corpse Spider attacks, their damage is increased by 30%.

Pandemic.name: Pandemic
Pandemic.description: Quest: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

ThingoftheDeep.name: Thing of the Deep
ThingoftheDeep.description: Increases the range of your Basic Abilities by 20%.

HexedCrawlers.name: Hexed Crawlers
HexedCrawlers.description: Corpse spiders restore 0.75% of your maximum Health and Mana when tey attack an enemy Hero.

BigVoodoo.name: Big Voodoo
BigVoodoo.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

BloodRitual.name: Blood Ritual
BloodRitual.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 1.95% of your maximum Health and Mana.

SpiritofArachyr.name: Spirit of Arachyr
SpiritofArachyr.description: If your jar of Corpse Spiders hits only 1 enemy, spawn an additional spider.

DeadRush.name: Dead Rush
DeadRush.description: Wall of Zombies deals 100% more damage.  When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

ToadsofHugeness.name: Toads of Hugeness
ToadsofHugeness.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 1% after each hop, up to maximum of 60%.

Gargantuan.name: Gargantuan
Gargantuan.description: Cooldown: 70 secondsSummon a Gargantuan that guards you for 20 seconds. Deals 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies when summoned, attacks for 428 (203 + 4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp.

RavenousSpirit.name: Ravenous Spirit
RavenousSpirit.description: Cooldown: 90 secondsChannel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 412 (196 + 4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

GuardianToads.name: Guardian Toads
GuardianToads.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads grants you Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25% for 2 seconds.

Superstition.name: Superstition
Superstition.description: You take 50% less damage from Abilities, but 30% more damage from Basic Attacks.

SpiderColony.name: Spider Colony
SpiderColony.description: Corpse Spiders' cooldown recharges 100% faster while above  1863 (884 +4% per level) Health.

RingofPoison.name: Ring of Poison
RingofPoison.description: Zombie Wall last 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 822 (390 + 4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

SoulHarvest.name: Soul Harvest
SoulHarvest.description: Cooldown: 15 secondsActivate to increase your Health and Ability Power by 3% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 15%. Lasts 15 seconds.

Humongoid.name: Humongoid
Humongoid.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 50 seconds and its mana cost by 50%.

AnnihilatingSpirit.name: Annihilating Spirit
AnnihilatingSpirit.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

FuryoftheStorm.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm.description: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

VileInfection.name: Vile Infection
VileInfection.description: Quest: After reaching 150 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.

AdvancedArtillery.name: Advanced Artillery
AdvancedArtillery.description: Increase the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%.

LethalBlast.name: Lethal Blast
LethalBlast.description: Increase the damage of Concussive Blast by 50%.

Resistant.name: Resistant
Resistant.description: While in Siege Mode, the duration of Silences, Stuns, Slows, and Roots are reduced by 75%.

Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.description: Stealth when entering Siege Mode. Your next Basic Attack from Siege Mode will deal 100% more damage. Lose Stealth when Basic Attacking, using an Ability, taking damage, or returning to Tank Mode.

MaelstromShells.name: Maelstrom Shells
MaelstromShells.description: Increase standard Basic Attack range by 20%.

SlowingMines.name: Slowing Mines
SlowingMines.description: Increase the Movement Speed slow of Spider Mines to 40%, and the duration to 2 seconds.

HyperCoolingEngines.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
HyperCoolingEngines.description: Reduce the cooldown of Thrusters by 10 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar.

BluntForceGun.name: Blunt Force Gun
BluntForceGun.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 365 damage to enemies in its path.

NapalmStrike.name: Napalm Strike
NapalmStrike.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

FirstStrike.name: First Strike
FirstStrike.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if you haven't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

BullheadMines.name: Bullhead Mines
BullheadMines.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

Barricade.name: Barricade
Barricade.description: Create a wall of path blocking debris for 4 seconds.

MineField.name: Mine Field
MineField.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

HoverSiegeMode.name: Hover Siege Mode
HoverSiegeMode.description: You can move at 50% Movement Speed in Siege Mode.

GraduatingRange.name: Graduating Range
GraduatingRange.description: While in Siege Mode your standard Basic Attack range increases by 20% every 3 seconds, up to 100%.

OrbitalBFG.name: Orbital BFG
OrbitalBFG.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

AdvancedLavaStrike.name: Advanced Lava Strike
AdvancedLavaStrike.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

OverflowingQuiver.name: Overflowing Quiver
OverflowingQuiver.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes and has a short cooldown.

Paralysis.name: Paralysis
Paralysis.description: Increases duration of Black Arrows by 75%

MercenaryQueen.name: Mercenary Queen
MercenaryQueen.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 50% more damage.

WitheringBarrage.name: Withering Barrage
WitheringBarrage.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

LostSoul.name: Lost Soul
LostSoul.description: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1.25 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

BarbedShot.name: Barbed Shot
BarbedShot.description: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

UnstablePoison.name: Unstable Poison
UnstablePoison.description: Minions and Mercenaries that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 255 (121 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

Possession.name: Possession
Possession.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for you. 3 charges.

WailingArrow.name: Wailing Arrow
WailingArrow.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

MindControl.name: Mind Control
MindControl.description: After 1 second cast, take control of an emeny Hero's movement and prevent them for doing anything else. Channel last 2.5 seconds.

LifeDrain.name: Life Drain
LifeDrain.description: Shadow Dagger heals you for 82 (39 + 4% per level) each time it spreads to a new enemy.

Windrunner.name: Windrunner
Windrunner.description: After you teleport from Haunting Wave, you can cast a second one for free within 2 seconds.

WilloftheForsaken.name: Will of the Forsaken
WilloftheForsaken.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

EvasiveFire.name: Evasive Fire
EvasiveFire.description: When you hit an emeny with Whitering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

ColdEmbrace.name: Cold Embrace
ColdEmbrace.description: Shadow Dagger makes the initial enemy Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, for 2 seconds.

OverwhelmingAffliction.name: Overwhelming Affliction
OverwhelmingAffliction.description: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

Remorseless.name: Remorseless
Remorseless.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

DeafeningBlast.name: Deafening Blast
DeafeningBlast.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

DarkLadysCall.name: Dark Lady's Call
DarkLadysCall.description: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

OlaftheStout.name: Olaf the Stout
OlaftheStout.description: Every 8 seconds Olaf can block a Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  Can store up to 2 charges.

SpyGames.name: Spy Games
SpyGames.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

ExplosiveAttacks.name: Explosive Attacks
ExplosiveAttacks.description: Increases Baleog’s splash damage against non-Heroic enemies to 100%.

VikingBribery.name: Viking Bribery
VikingBribery.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 100.Current number of Viking Bribery stacks:

PainDontHurt.name: Pain Don't Hurt
PainDontHurt.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

EriktheSwift.name: Erik the Swift
EriktheSwift.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 Health per second.

ItsaSabotage.name: It's a Sabotage!
ItsaSabotage.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 5 Ammo and deal 135 damage over 10 seconds.

BaleogtheFierce.name: Baleog the Fierce
BaleogtheFierce.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

SpinToWin.name: Spin To Win!
SpinToWin.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 damage to nearby enemies.

NorseForce.name: Norse Force
NorseForce.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsAll Vikings gain a 240 (50 + 10 per level) to 480 (100 + 20 per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

LongboatRaid.name: Longboat Raid!
LongboatRaid.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

PlayAgain.name: Play Again!
PlayAgain.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

HunkaBurningOlaf.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
HunkaBurningOlaf.description: Olaf deals 34 damage every second to nearby enemies.

Jump.name: Jump!
Jump.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

NordicAttackSquad.name: Nordic Attack Squad
NordicAttackSquad.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

LargeandInCharge.name: Large and In Charge
LargeandInCharge.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

ImpatienceIsaVirtue.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
ImpatienceIsaVirtue.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

64KBMarathon.name: 64 KB Marathon
64KBMarathon.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

RagnaroknRoll.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
RagnaroknRoll.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

CheckpointReached.name: Checkpoint Reached
CheckpointReached.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

TheSequel.name: The Sequel!
TheSequel.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

Backlash.name: Backlash
Backlash.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health.

Shackler.name: Shackler
Shackler.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 1249 (593 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

Shade.name: Shade
Shade.description: While Bone Armor is active, you evade all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

Jailors.name: Jailors
Jailors.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors that fixate on the emeny for 15 seconds. These do not count towards your Raise Skeleton maximum.

TragOulsEssence.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
TragOulsEssence.description: Gain 8 Mana when you raise a Skeletal Warrior.

HarvestVitality.name: Harvest Vitality
HarvestVitality.description: Cursed Strikes heals you for 145 (69 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit.

Weaken.name: Weaken
Weaken.description: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow from 50% to 75%.

RathmasBlessing.name: Rathma's Blessing
RathmasBlessing.description: Raising a Skeletal Warrior heals you for 145 (69 + 4% per level).

PoisonNova.name: Poison Nova
PoisonNova.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 1249 (593 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

SkeletalMages.name: Skeletal Mages
SkeletalMages.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 103 (49 + 4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

Decrepify.name: Decrepify
Decrepify.description: Spectral Scythe slows enemies by 40% for 3 seconds.

GiantsCurse.name: Giant's Curse
GiantsCurse.description: Cursed Stike deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

CorpseExplosion.name: Corpse Explosion
CorpseExplosion.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 143 (68 + 4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

FlowingWounds.name: Flowing Wounds
FlowingWounds.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 4 seconds if you hit an enemy Hero.

AmplifyDamage.name: Amplify Damage
AmplifyDamage.description: Enemies rooted by Bone Prision become Vunerable for 2 seconds, taking 25% increased damage.

SkeletonMastery.name: Skeleton Mastery
SkeletonMastery.description: Increases the maximum Skeletal Warriors you can have to 6 and increases their damage by 100%.

CalloftheGrave.name: Call of the Grave
CalloftheGrave.description: Poison Nova deals an additional 1% of the target's maximum life as damage every second.

RaisedMage.name: Raised Mage
RaisedMage.description: When a nearby enemy Hero dies, a Frost Mage appears from their corpse to fight for you. Also increases thge slow of Frost Mages from 30% to 50%.

MortalWound.name: Mortal Wound
MortalWound.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

BoneSpear.name: Bone Spear
BoneSpear.description: Cooldown: 10 secondsDeal 570 (271 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

VolatileAcid.name: Volatile Acid
VolatileAcid.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures is increased by 50%.

CorpseFeeders.name: Corpse Feeders
CorpseFeeders.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

Infest.name: Infest
Infest.description: Cooldown: 0.5 secondsNearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 200% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

EnvenomedSpines.name: Envenomed Spines
EnvenomedSpines.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsActivate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 504 (240 + 4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

MedusaBlades.name: Medusa Blades
MedusaBlades.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

SerratedSpines.name: Serrated Spines
SerratedSpines.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

BanelingMassacre.name: Baneling Massacre
BanelingMassacre.description: Zagara gains 2 additional charges of Banelings.

ViscousAcid.name: Viscous Acid
ViscousAcid.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

BileDrop.name: Bile Drop
BileDrop.description: Quest: Increases the impact damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases the bonus damage by another 10%. Reward: Upon reaching 10% bonus damage, increases the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

DevouringMaw.name: Devouring Maw
DevouringMaw.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 176 (84 + 3% per level) damage per second.Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

NydusNetwork.name: Nydus Network
NydusNetwork.description: Passive: Creep spreads 25% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack educes all of Zagara's cooldowns by 1 second. Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision of. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-cliking near it. While insde a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.

HydraliskTransfusion.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
HydraliskTransfusion.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks.

ProtectiveCoating.name: Protective Coating
ProtectiveCoating.description: While on Creep, Zagara takes 20% less damage.

BroodExpansion.name: Brood Expansion
BroodExpansion.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

CorrosiveSaliva.name: Corrosive Saliva
CorrosiveSaliva.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

Mutalisk.name: Mutalisk
Mutalisk.description: Your Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and do not have a timed life.

TyrantMaw.name: Tyrant Maw
TyrantMaw.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and when you get a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

BroodlingNest.name: Broodling Nest
BroodlingNest.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 20% Movement Speed.
